src: 以前にナイジェリアは、サミットの1週間前までにAfCFTAに参加する予定であると発表していました。 AUのアルバート・ムシャンガ貿易産業コミッショナーは、ベナンが参加すると発表しました。 長官は、「原産地規則や関税についてはまだ合意に至っていないものの、2020年7月1日に取引を始めるための枠組みは十分に整っている」と述べました。
mt: Nigeria had previously announced that it would join the AfCFTA by the end of the week before the summit. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on rules of origin or tariffs, but the framework is in place to start trading on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: 以前にナイジェリアは、サミットの1週間前までにAfCFTAに参加する予定であると発表していました。 AUのアルバート・ムシャンガ貿易産業コミッショナーは、ベナンが参加すると発表しました。 長官は、「原産地規則や関税についてはまだ合意に至っていないものの、2020年7月1日に取引を始めるための枠組みは十分に整っている」と述べました。
mt: Nigeria had previously announced that it would join the AfCFTA by the end of the week before the summit. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on rules of origin or tariffs, but the framework is in place to start trading on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: 彼女はアトランタでの滞在中に批評家から称賛され、革新的な都市教育について認められました。 2009年に彼女は年間最優秀教育長の称号を授与されました。 受賞当時、アトランタの学校ではテストの点数が大幅に伸びていました。 その直後、「アトランタ・ジャーナル・コンスティテューション」誌は、テスト結果に問題があることを示す報告書を発表しました。 報告書では、テストの点数が驚くほど急速に伸びたことを示し、校内で問題が発覚したにもかかわらず学校側がそれに対処しなかったと主張しています。 それ以降の証拠は試験用紙が改ざんされたことを示しており、ホール氏は他の34人の教育関係者とともに2013年に起訴されました。
mt: She was praised and recognized for innovative urban education during her stay in Atlanta. In 2009, she was awarded the annual best superintendent title. At the time, Atlanta's schools were seeing a dramatic rise in test scores. Shortly after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that showed problems with the test results. The report showed that test scores were rising too quickly, and that the school did not address the issues that were discovered within the school. Evidence after that showed that the test papers were tampered with, and in 2013, Hall was charged along with 34 other education officials.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: 知事執務式の外で爆弾が爆発しました。 その後2時間のうちに、さらに3つの爆弾が官庁施設の付近で爆発しました。 一部の報告では公式の死者数は8人とされ、公式の報告では最大30人が負傷したことが確認されていますが、最終的な人数はまだわかっていません。
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded in the vicinity of government buildings within two hours. Some reports say the official death toll is eight, and the official report says up to thirty people were injured, but the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21歳のジーザスは昨年2017年1月に2700万ポンド（約2,700万円）と報じられた移籍金を払ってブラジルのクラブであるパルメイラスからマンチェスター・シティに移籍しました。 以降、このブラジル人選手は同クラブから53試合に出場し、24ゴールを決めています。
mt: 21-year-old Jesus was reported to have been signed for a transfer fee of £27 million (about 270 million yen) last year in January from Brazilian club Palmeiras to Manchester City. Since then, this Brazilian player has played 53 games for the club, scoring 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: 21歳のジーザスは昨年2017年1月に2700万ポンド（約2,700万円）と報じられた移籍金を払ってブラジルのクラブであるパルメイラスからマンチェスター・シティに移籍しました。 以降、このブラジル人選手は同クラブから53試合に出場し、24ゴールを決めています。

ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: 現地時間の今朝10時頃に、イスラム教の聖地メッカでホステルが崩壊しました。 この建物には、ハッジ巡礼の前夜に聖地を訪れた大勢の巡礼者が収容されていました。 このホステルの宿泊客は、ほとんどがアラブ首長国連邦の方々でした。 死者数は15人以上で、今後も増加が予想されます。
mt: 10:00 local time this morning, a hostel collapsed in the Islamic holy city of Mecca. This building was used to house a large number of pilgrims who visited the holy city the night before the Hajj pilgrimage. Most of the hostel's guests were from the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15 and is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: 重さが1,000ポンドを超え、時速約17,500マイルで移動していた人工衛星は、地球の上空491マイルのところで衝突しました。 科学者によると、この衝突による爆発は大規模なものでした。 彼らは、衝突がどのくらいの規模で、地球がどのような影響を受けるのかについて現在も調査しています。 米国防総省事務所の米戦略司令部がこのデブリを追跡しています。 プロット分析の結果は、公開サイトに掲載される予定です。
mt: A 1,000-pound satellite moving at about 17,500 miles per hour collided with another satellite in Earth's orbit 491 miles above the planet. Scientists say the explosion was large. They are still investigating how large the collision was and what impact it will have on Earth. The U.S. Department of Defense's U.S. Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the plot analysis will be posted on a public site.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: 重さが1,000ポンドを超え、時速約17,500マイルで移動していた人工衛星は、地球の上空491マイルのところで衝突しました。 科学者によると、この衝突による爆発は大規模なものでした。 彼らは、衝突がどのくらいの規模で、地球がどのような影響を受けるのかについて現在も調査しています。 米国防総省事務所の米戦略司令部がこのデブリを追跡しています。 プロット分析の結果は、公開サイトに掲載される予定です。
mt: A 1,000-pound satellite moving at about 17,500 miles per hour collided with another satellite in Earth's orbit 491 miles above the planet. Scientists say the explosion was large. They are still investigating how large the collision was and what impact it will have on Earth. The U.S. Department of Defense's U.S. Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the plot analysis will be posted on a public site.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: バッテン氏は2008年版アメリカ長者番付で190位に入り、推定資産額は23億ドルでした。 彼は、1950年にバージニア大学芸術科学部を卒業し、同大学に多額の寄付をしました。
mt: 2008 Forbes 400 list ranked him 190th, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and donated a large sum to the university.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: カリフォルニア州のアーノルド・シュワルツェネッガー知事は、暴力的なビデオゲームを未成年者に販売やレンタルすることを禁止する法案に署名しました。 法案では、カリフォルニア州で販売する暴力的なビデオゲームに「18歳」というラベルを貼ることを義務付け、1回の違反（未成年者への販売）につき1000ドルの罰金が科されます。
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled "18," and imposes a $1,000 fine for each violation (sale to a minor).
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: 既婚者であり、成人した2人の子を持つデュバルは、この話に関係するミラーにあまり印象を残しませんでした。 コメントを求められたミラー氏は、「公聴会ではマイクがよくしゃべるので、私は準備をしていたので、何を言っているのかよく聞こえなかった」と述べた。
mt: Married and with two adult children, Dubar was not particularly impressed by the story. Asked for comment, Miller said, "The microphone was very talkative at the hearing, so I was prepared, so I didn't hear what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: スティーブン・ハーパー首相は、NDP党首であるジャック・レイトン氏と火曜日にPMOで25分間会談した後、その2回目の審議を前にして、政府の「クリーンエア法」を精査するすべての党の委員会に送ることに合意しました。 レイトン氏は首相との会談で保守党の環境法案に対する変更を求め、保守党の環境法案の「徹底的かつ完全な書き直し」を求めました。 連邦政府がタスマニア州デボンポートのマーシー病院の資金調達を引き継ぐために介入して以来、州政府と一部の連邦議員は、この行為を11月までに招集される連邦選挙の前哨戦での煽り行為だとして批判しています。 しかし、ジョン・ハワード首相は、この法律について、4500万豪ドルの追加資金を投入することで、タスマニア政府から格下げされないように病院施設を守るためだけのものだったと述べている。
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to all parties' committees for review before the second round of talks, after meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton for 25 minutes at the PMO on Tuesday. Layton asked the Conservative Party to change its environmental bill, and asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill. Since the federal government intervened to take over funding for the Marcy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized this as a pre-election provocation in the lead-up to the federal election in November. However, John Howard said that this law was only to protect the hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, by injecting an additional $450 million.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: 汚染されたペットフードを食べて死亡したペットの尿サンプルからシアン酸とメラミンの両方が検出されました。 その大学の研究者たちによれば、この2つの化合物は、互いに反応して腎臓の機能を阻害しうる結晶を形成します。 研究者らは、メラミンとシアヌル酸の添加によって猫の尿に形成された結晶を観察しました。 これらの結晶の組成は、赤外分光法（FTIR）で比較すると、患部のペットの尿中に見られるものと一致します。
mt: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were detected in urine samples from pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. According to the university's researchers, the two compounds can react to form crystals that can block kidney function. The researchers observed crystals formed by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid to cat urine. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets, according to infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: 新華社は、政府の調査員が水曜日に「ブラックボックス」のフライトレコーダー2台を回収したと報じました。 仲間のレスラーたちもルナに敬意を表しました。 トミー・ドリーマーは「ルナは初代クイーン・オブ・エクストリームでした。私の最初のマネージャーでもありました。ルナは月が2つ出た夜に亡くなりました。彼女と同じようにかなりユニークな夜でした。強い女性でした。」と語っています。 ダスティン・「ゴールドダスト」・ラネルズは、「ルナは俺と同じくらい異常だった…あるいはそれ以上だったかも...彼女を愛しているし、彼女がいなくて寂しくなるよ…叶うならば、彼女には天国にいてほしい」とコメントしました。
mt: Xinhua reported government investigators recovered two flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. She was also my first manager. Luna passed away on a night when the moon was out twice. It was a pretty unique night. She was a strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented, "Luna was as abnormal as I was...or maybe more so...I love her and miss her...if it were up to me, I'd want her in heaven."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: 車の衝突時には３人が家の中にいましたが、怪我人はいませんでした。 しかし、運転手は頭部に重傷を負いました。 衝突事故が起きた道路は、救急隊が赤いアウディTTから運転手を救助するまで一時通行止めになりました。 当初、彼はグレート・ヤーマスにあるジェームズ・パジェット病院に入院していました。 後に彼はケンブリッジのアデンブルック病院に転院しました。
mt: 3 people were inside the house at the time of the collision, but there were no injuries. However, the driver sustained head injuries. The road was closed to traffic for a time while emergency crews rescued the driver from his red Audi TT. Initially, he was admitted to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: 試合は午前10時にキックオフされ、朝方に降った霧雨はからりと上がり、7人制ラグビーには最高の日となりました。 このトーナメントのトップシードである南アフリカは、第5シードのザンビアに26-00の快勝を収め、好調な滑り出しを見せました。 南部の姉妹国との対戦では明らかに錆びついているように見えましたが、南アフリカは大会が進むにつれて着実に調子を上げていきました。 彼らの規律あるディフェンス、ボールハンドリングのスキル、そして優れたチームワークは傑出しており、このチームが勝者であることは明らかだった。
mt: The match kicked off at 10 am, and the misty rain that fell in the early morning cleared up, making it a perfect day for sevens rugby. The top seed South Africa won 26-0 against the fifth seed Zambia, and had a good start. They seemed to be rusty against their sister nations in the south, but South Africa steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills, and excellent teamwork were outstanding, and it was clear that this team would win.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: この30年間に、中国は公式には共産主義国家のままであるにもかかわらず、市場経済を発展させてきました。 最初の経済改革は、鄧小平の指導の下で進められました。 以来、中国の経済規模は90倍にまで成長を遂げました。 昨年、中国は自動車輸出台数で初めてドイツを上回るとともに業界の市場規模では米国を抜き最大となりました。 中国のGDPは20年以内に米国を上回る可能性があります。
mt: 30 years ago, China was officially still a communist state, but has since developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown 900-fold. Last year, China became the first country to surpass Germany in car exports and became the largest market in the industry, surpassing the United States. China's GDP could surpass the United States within 20 years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: 「我々は、2020年までにGDPあたりの二酸化炭素排出量を2005年の水準から大幅に削減するように努力する」と胡錦濤国家主席は述べました。 胡氏は、削減する数値を定めませんでしたが、削減は中国の経済産出量に基づいて実施されるだろうと述べました。 胡錦濤国家主席は、発展途上国に「まず汚染してから後始末をするというこれまでのやり方を避けるように」と呼びかけました。 「しかし、発展段階、責任、能力を超えた義務を負うことを求められてはならない」と付け加えました。
mt: "We will make efforts to reduce our carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount by 2020 compared with 2005," President Hu Jintao said. He did not specify the reduction amount, but said it would be based on China's economic output. President Hu called on developing countries to "avoid the old approach of polluting first and cleaning up later." "However, we should not be asked to take on obligations beyond our development stage, responsibility and capacity," he added.
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: 医療慈善団体のマンゴラ、国境なき医師団および世界保健機関は、それがこの国で記録された最悪の疫病の大流行であると述べています。 国境なき医師団のリチャード・ヴェールマン報道官は次のように述べています。「アンゴラでは過去最悪の大流行が予想され、状況は非常に悪いままだ。」と述べました。
mt: The medical charity Médecins Sans Frontières, Doctors Without Borders, and the World Health Organization say it is the worst epidemic ever recorded in this country. Médecins Sans Frontières spokesman Richard Véron said, "In Angola, the worst epidemic ever is expected, and the situation is very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: 公訴局長官のキアー・スターマー王室顧問弁護士は今朝、ハーン氏とプライス氏の両氏を起訴するという声明を発表しました。 フーネ氏は辞任し、内閣ではエド・デイビー下院議員がその後任となる予定です。デイビー氏の退任で空席となる事業所管大臣の席にはノーマン・ラム下院議員が就くと予想されます。 フーネ氏とプライス氏は2月16日にウェストミンスター治安判事裁判所に出廷する予定です。
mt: Attorney General Sir Keir Starmer KC announced this morning that both Mr. Han and Mr. Price would be charged. Mr. Fone resigned, and Ed Davey MP is expected to take his place. Mr. Davey's resignation leaves the seat of Secretary of State for Business vacant, which is expected to be filled by Norman Lamb MP. Mr. Fone and Mr. Price are scheduled to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: カミーユ・サン＝サーンスによるフランスのオペラで使われたこの物語は、「麻薬と日本への愛に人生を左右された」ある芸術家の物語です。 結果として、舞台上で出演者が大麻を吸い、劇場側も観客に参加を呼びかけています。
mt: This story, about an artist whose life was affected by drugs and love for Japan, was used in a French opera by Camille Saint-Saëns. As a result, actors on stage smoke marijuana, and the theater encourages audience participation.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: レオーノフは「宇宙飛行士11号」とも呼ばれ、ソ連の軍人であり、初期宇宙飛行士チームの一員でした。 1965年3月18日、彼は初の有人船外活動（EVA）つまり「宇宙遊泳」を体験し、12分以上にわたって宇宙船外で1人で活動しました。 彼はその功績により、ソビエト連邦最高の栄誉である「ソ連邦英雄」の称号を授かりました。 10年後に彼はアポロ・ソユーズ計画でソ連側を指揮し、これは宇宙開発競争の終焉を象徴するものでした。
mt: Leonov was also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11" and was a Soviet military officer and a member of the early spaceflight team. On March 18, 1965, he experienced the first human extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk," spending more than 12 minutes outside the spacecraft alone. He was awarded the highest honor in the Soviet Union, the title of "Hero of the Soviet Union," for his achievement. Ten years later, he commanded the Soviet side of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which symbolized the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: 事故発生後、ギブソン氏は病院に搬送されましたが、その後まもなく死亡しました。 トラックの運転手は64歳でしたが、この事故で怪我はありませんでした。 車両自体は同日のグリニッジ標準時12:00頃に事故現場から持ち去られました。 事故現場近くの車庫で働いていた男性は、「道を渡ろうと待っている子供たちがみんな泣き叫んでいた。」と語りました。 全員が事故現場から逃げ帰りました。
mt: After the accident, Gibson was taken to the hospital, but later died. The truck driver was 64 years old and was not injured. The vehicle was taken away from the accident site at around 12:00 Greenwich Mean Time on the same day. A man who worked in a nearby garage said, "There were children crying and screaming as they were trying to cross the road." Everyone ran away from the accident site.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: 内容はほとんどが理論的なものでしたが、書かれたプログラムは射手座銀河で実施した観測を模擬するものでした。 このチームが求めていた効果は、銀河系の暗黒物質と天の川の暗黒物質の間で働く潮汐力による作用だったのでしょう。 月の引力で地球に潮の満ち引きが起きるように、天の川は射手座銀河にも力を及ぼしています。 科学者たちは、暗黒物質は、通常の物質と同じように他の暗黒物質にも影響を与えていると結論づけました。 この理論によると、銀河の周りにある暗黒物質のほとんどは、一種のハローのように銀河を取り巻き、たくさんの小粒子でできていると言われています。
mt: The paper was mostly theoretical, but the program it described simulated observations of the Milky Way. The team was looking for the effect of tidal forces between the dark matter of the Milky Way and the dark matter of the Sagittarius galaxy. Just as the moon's gravity causes tides on Earth, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists concluded that dark matter, like ordinary matter, affects other dark matter. According to this theory, most of the dark matter around the galaxy is like a halo, made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: この議論は、ハリケーン・カトリーナの去った後の救済と復興にかかる支出をめぐる論争に端を発していました。一部の財政保守派は、ユーモアを込めてこれを「ブッシュのニューオリンズ政策」と呼んでいます。 復興努力に対するリベラル派からの批判では、ワシントンの内部関係者と思われる人物と復興契約を交わしたことに焦点を当てています。
mt: This debate was sparked by the controversy over the cost of relief and recovery efforts in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina. Some fiscal conservatives have jokingly referred to this as "Bush's New Orleans policy." Liberal criticism of the recovery effort has focused on the fact that the contracts were awarded to Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: カプセルが地球の大気圏に突入するのは午前5時頃（東部時間）の予定で、北カリフォルニア、オレゴン、ネバダ、ユタの人々の目にまばゆい光跡が映ると期待されています。 このカプセルは、まるで夜空に降る流れ星のように見えることでしょう。 カプセルの速度は約12.8 km/秒（8マイル/秒）で、サンフランシスコからロサンゼルスまで1分しかかからないほどの速さです。 スターダストは、1969年5月にアポロX号のコマンドモジュールを帰還させた際の記録を更新し、地球に帰還した宇宙船の最速記録を更新することになります。 「スターダストはカリフォルニア州北部の西海岸を通過し、カリフォルニアからオレゴン州中央部、ネバダ州、アイダホ州、ユタ州を通過して空を照らすでしょう」とスターダストのプロジェクトマネージャーであるトム・ダックスベリー氏は語りました。
mt: The capsule is expected to enter the Earth's atmosphere around 5 am local time (eastern), and the people of northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah are expected to see a bright trail in the sky. The capsule will look like a falling star in the night sky. The speed of the capsule is 12.8 km/s (8 mph), which is fast enough to travel from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will update the record of returning the Apollo X command module in May 1969 and will update the record of the fastest returning spacecraft to Earth. "Stardust will light up the sky as it passes over the west coast of northern California, through central Oregon, Nevada, Idaho, and Utah," said Tom Daxböck, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: ペンシルベニア州ピッツバーグの小児病院で働いていた医師は、水曜日に母親が車のトランクで死んでいるのが発見された後、加重殺人で起訴される予定であるとオハイオ州の当局は述べています。 マラー・バラスブラマニアン博士（29歳）は、シンシナティの郊外、北約15マイルのオハイオ州ブルーアッシュで遺体となって発見され、道路脇の地面にＴシャツと下着姿で横たわる姿は明らかに薬漬けの状態でした。 彼女は500フィート離れたところに駐車してあった黒いオールズモビル・イントリーグまで警官を案内した。 そこにあったのは、血まみれの毛布に覆われたサロジャ・バラスブラマニアンさん（53歳）の遺体でした。 警察によると、その遺体は1日ほど前からそこにあったという。
mt: A doctor who worked at a children's hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, is expected to be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of a car on Wednesday, according to officials in Ohio. Dr. Malara Balasubramanian (29) was found dead in Ohio, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, with her clothes off and clearly drugged, lying on the ground next to a black Oldsmobile Intrigue that she had parked 500 feet away and directed police to. Inside the car was the body of her mother, Salojia Balasubramanian (53), who had been there for a day or so, according to police.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: eBay史上最大の買収です。 同社は収益源を多様化し、中国、東欧、ブラジルなどSkypeが優勢な地域で人気を集めたいと考えています。
mt: The largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company wants to diversify its revenue sources and hopes to be popular in regions where Skype is strong, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

mt: The largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company wants to diversify its revenue sources and hopes to be popular in regions where Skype is strong, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: 負傷者が病院に搬送された後に戦闘が収まると、他の約40人の受刑者は中庭に残り、独房に戻ることを拒否しました。 交渉人たちは事態の収拾を図ろうとしたが、囚人の要求は明らかではない。 10:00～11:00pm MDTの間に受刑者が庭に火を放ったのでした。 まもなく暴動鎮圧用の装備を着用した警官たちが収容所に入り、催涙ガスで受刑者を追い詰めました。 消防隊は最終的に午後11時35分までに火を消しました。
mt: 40 inmates refused to return to their cells after being transported to the hospital following the riot. Negotiators attempted to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were unclear. At 10:00-11:00pm MDT, inmates set fire to the yard. Shortly after, officers dressed in riot gear entered the facility and used tear gas to subdue the inmates. Firefighters extinguished the fire by 11:35pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: このコメントはテレビで生中継されたもので、イランの高官が制裁の効果を認めたのは初めてのことでした。 制裁としては、金融規制や、EUによる原油輸出禁止措置などがありますが、原油の輸出はイラン経済の対外収入の80%を占めるものです。 直近の月次報告で、OPECは原油の輸出量が日量280万バレルと20年間で最も低い水準に落ち込んだと発表しました。 イランの最高指導者であるアヤトラ・アリ・カーメネイ氏は、石油への依存を1979年に起イランで起きたイスラム革命以前からの「罠」と表現しており、イランはそこから解放されるべきだとしています。
mt: This comment was made live on television, and was the first time an Iranian official has acknowledged the effects of sanctions. Sanctions include financial regulations and an EU ban on oil exports, which make up 80% of Iran's foreign income. The most recent monthly report showed that OPEC's oil exports fell to 2.8 million barrels per day, the lowest level in 20 years. Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has described oil dependence as a "trap" that existed before the 1979 Islamic Revolution in Iran, and that Iran should be freed from it.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: フランスでは、投票は伝統的に旧式な設備で実施されます。有権者はブースで隔離され、あらかじめ印刷された候補者を示す用紙を封筒に入れます。 有権者は職員による本人確認の後、封筒を投票箱に投函し、選挙人名簿に署名します。 フランスの選挙法は、むしろ厳密に手続きを成文化しています。 1988年以降、投票箱は透明でなければならず、投票開始時に封筒がないこと、および正当に集計された有権者の封筒以外に封筒が追加されないことを有権者と監視員が確認できるようになりました。 候補者は、その手続きのどの部分にも代表者を立ち会わせることができます。夕方には、特定の手順に従い、厳重な監視の下でボランティアによって開票されます。
mt: In France, voting is traditionally carried out using old-fashioned equipment. Voters are isolated in booths and put pre-printed candidate slips into envelopes. After voter identification by staff, the envelope is deposited in a ballot box and signed on the electoral register. The French electoral law is rather formalizing the procedure. Since 1988, ballot boxes have been transparent and voters and monitors have been able to verify that there are no envelopes at the start of voting and that no envelopes other than those legitimately collected from voters have been added. Candidates can have representatives present at any part of the procedure. In the evening, the ballots are counted by volunteers in strict accordance with specific procedures under close supervision.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: もし確認されれば、これでアレンの8年間にわたった武蔵の捜索が完了する。 海底マッピングに続いて、ROVを使用して難破船が発見されました。 世界有数の富豪であるアレンは、海洋探査に多くの富を投じたと言われ、生涯にわたって戦争に関心を示し、武蔵の捜索を始めたと伝えられています。
mt: If confirmed, this would complete Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.  The ship was found using a ROV after a sea floor mapping.  Allen, one of the world's richest men, is said to have invested much of his fortune in ocean exploration and has been interested in war throughout his life, starting the search for the Musashi.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: テレビの報道によると、原発から白煙が上がっています。 自治体は、原発周辺の住民に屋外に出ないように警告し、エアコンを切り、水道水を飲まないように警告しています。 日本の原子力庁によれば、原発内で放射性セシウムとヨウ素が特定されています。 当局の推定では、これはウラン燃料が入っていたコンテナが破裂し、燃料が漏れている可能性を示しています。
mt: According to television reports, white smoke is rising from the plant.  The municipality is warning residents in the area of the plant not to go outside, to turn off air conditioners, and not to drink tap water.  According to the Japanese Nuclear Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified inside the plant.  The government estimates this is due to a container holding uranium fuel rupturing, and fuel leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: トニー・モール博士は、南アフリカのクワズールー・ナタール地方で、極度薬剤耐性結核（XDR-TB）を発見しました。 インタビューで彼は新しい変異体について「極めて致死率が高い厄介なものであり、憂慮すべきものである」と述べました。 モル博士は、何人かの患者が病院内で感染したのではないかと推測し、少なくとも2人は病院の医療従事者であったと考えています。 1人の感染者が1年後に10～15人の濃厚接触者に感染させる可能性があります。 しかし、結核患者全体に占めるXDR-TBの割合はまだ低いようで、こうしている間にも南アフリカでは33万人のうち6,000人が感染している。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extreme drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the Kwazulu-Natal region of South Africa. In an interview, he said of the new strain, "It is a very virulent and nasty thing and it is something to be concerned about." Dr. Moll suspects that at least two of the patients were infected within the hospital, and that one of them was a hospital worker. One infected person can infect 10 to 15 close contacts in a year. However, the proportion of XDR-TB among all tuberculosis patients is still low, and in the meantime, 33,000 people in South Africa are infected with tuberculosis.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGenは、航空機が短距離路線を飛行し、毎年数百万ガロンの燃料を節約し、二酸化炭素の排出量を削減できるようにするシステムだとFAAは主張しています。 従来の地上レーダー型技術とは対照的な衛星型技術を採用しており、管制官がより正確に航空機を特定し、より正確な情報を操縦士に提供できるようになっている。
mt: The FAA claims NextGen will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes, saving hundreds of millions of gallons of fuel and reducing carbon dioxide emissions each year. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the ground-based radar technology used in the past, allowing controllers to more accurately identify aircraft and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: 歴史家たちは、過去のFBIの方針が、解決しやすい事件、特に盗難車事件にリソースを集中させ、FBIの成功率を上げることを目的としていると批判しています。 連邦議会は2005年度から猥褻物取締法への資金提供を開始し、FBIはアダルトポルノに10人の捜査員を投入しなければならないと規定しました。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of focusing resources on easy-to-solve crimes, particularly car thefts, in order to boost the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the Obscene Materials Act in 2005, and the FBI was required to assign ten investigators to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 歴史家たちは、過去のFBIの方針が、解決しやすい事件、特に盗難車事件にリソースを集中させ、FBIの成功率を上げることを目的としていると批判しています。 連邦議会は2005年度から猥褻物取締法への資金提供を開始し、FBIはアダルトポルノに10人の捜査員を投入しなければならないと規定しました。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of focusing resources on easy-to-solve crimes, particularly car thefts, in order to boost the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the Obscene Materials Act in 2005, and the FBI was required to assign ten investigators to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39Cグリペンは現地時間の午前9時30分頃（UTC 0230）に滑走路に墜落して爆発し、その影響で空港の商業便が閉鎖されました。 操縦士は中隊長のディロクリット・パタヴェー氏であることが確認されました。 地元メディアの報道によると、空港の消防車が対応中に横転したということです。
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed at 9:30 a.m. local time (UTC 0230) on the runway, causing the airport's commercial flights to be closed. The pilot was confirmed to be Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pathavee. According to local media, the fire truck responding to the crash flipped over.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: JAS 39Cグリペンは現地時間の午前9時30分頃（UTC 0230）に滑走路に墜落して爆発し、その影響で空港の商業便が閉鎖されました。 操縦士は中隊長のディロクリット・パタヴェー氏であることが確認されました。 地元メディアの報道によると、空港の消防車が対応中に横転したということです。
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed at 9:30 a.m. local time (UTC 0230) on the runway, causing the airport's commercial flights to be closed. The pilot was confirmed to be Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pathavee. According to local media, the fire truck responding to the crash flipped over.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 1960年代を通して、ブレジンスキーはジョン・F・ケネディの顧問を務め、その後リンドン・B・ジョンソン政権でも活躍しました。 1976 年の大統領選ではカーターの外交政策について助言し、1977 年から 1981 年まで国家安全保障顧問（NSA）を務め、ヘンリー・キッシンジャーの後を継ぎました。 NSAとしてカーターを補佐し、1978年のキャンプ・デイビッド合意、1970年代後半の米中関係の正常化、1979年のイラン人質事件につながったイラン革命、1979年のソビエトのアフガニスタン侵攻など、世界問題を外交的に処理した。
mt: 1960s, Brezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later served in the Johnson administration. He advised Carter's foreign policy in the 1976 presidential election, and served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped negotiate the Camp David Accords, normalized US-China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979, which led to the Iran hostage crisis.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: クロアチアの首都ザグレブで生まれたボベックは、パルチザンベオグラードで活躍していた頃に有名になりました。 1945年に彼らと合流し、1958年まで滞在した。 在籍期間に468試合に出場し、403ゴールを記録した。 ボベックほどこのクラブで多くの出場回数やゴールを挙げた選手は他にいません。 1995年にはパルチザン史上最高の選手に選ばれた。
mt: Born in Zagreb, Croatia, Bobek became famous while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958, playing in 468 matches and scoring 403 goals. No other player has made as many appearances or scored as many goals for this club. In 1995, he was voted the club's greatest player.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: ヘスペロニクス・エリザベサエは、ドロマエサウルス科でヴェロキラプトルの一種です。 全身を羽毛に覆われたこの温血猛禽は、ヴェロキラプトルのような爪を持つ2本足で直立歩行していたと考えられています。 2本目の爪が大きかったことから、「西部の爪」を意味するヘスペロニクスと名付けられました。
mt: Hesperornis elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae, a group of dinosaurs that includes Velociraptor. This warm-blooded, feathered carnivore is thought to have stood upright on two legs, like Velociraptor, and had two large claws on its feet. It was named Hesperornis, meaning "western claw," because of its large second claw.
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: 昨年結婚式を挙げたある夫婦の1周年を祝うために100人以上が参加しました。 正式な記念式典は後日予定されていた、と関係者は語りました。 夫婦は1年前にテキサスで結婚し、友人や親戚と祝うためにバッファローに来ていました。 バッファロー出身の30歳の夫は、銃撃戦で死亡した4人のうちの1人でしたが、その妻に怪我はありませんでした。
mt: 100 or more people attended a one-year anniversary celebration for a couple who married last year. A formal ceremony was planned for a later date, according to sources. The couple married in Texas last year and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old Buffalo native was one of four people killed in a shootout, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: ルノ号は120～160立米の燃料を積んでいましたが、強風と高波によって船体が防波堤に押し込まれてしまいました。 乗組員12人がヘリコプターに救助され、唯一の負傷は鼻骨骨折でした。 全長100メートルの船は、いつもどおりに肥料の貨物を積み込む途中だったため、当初、関係者は船から荷物が落下するのではないかと心配していました。
mt: The Rena was carrying 120 to 160 cubic metres of fuel when it was driven into the breakwater by strong winds and high waves. Twelve crew members were rescued by helicopter and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre-long ship was in the process of loading its usual cargo of fertiliser, so at first, officials were worried that cargo might fall off the ship.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: 監督業以外でヴォーティエの業績としては、1973年に政治的検閲に反対してハンガーストライキを実施したことが挙げられます。 フランス法が改正されました。彼の活動の始まりは15歳のとき、第二次世界大戦中にフランスのレジスタンスに参加したことでした。 彼は1998年に出版した本の中で自身のことを書いています。 1960年代には、映画の撮り方について指導するために、独立直後のアルジェリアに戻りました。
mt: In addition to his directing career, Vautier is known for his other work, including a hunger strike in 1973 to protest political censorship. The French law was amended. He began his activism at the age of 15, when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote about himself in a book published in 1998. In the 1960s, he returned to independent Algeria to teach film-making.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: 400万人以上が葬儀に参列しようとローマに向かいました。 参列者の数が多すぎて、全員がサンピエトロ広場での葬儀に参加することは不可能でした。 ローマの各所には、人々に式典を見てもらおうと、大型テレビ画面がいくつも設置されていました。 イタリア国内の他の多くの都市や世界の他の地域（特にポーランド）で同じように設置がされ、多くの人々が視聴しました。
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. So many people came that it was impossible for everyone to attend the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Large television screens were set up in Rome's other places to allow people to see the ceremony. The same was done in many other Italian cities and in other parts of the world (especially Poland), and many people watched.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 報道によると、マクベス通りのアパートがガス漏れで爆発しました。 近所の人からガス漏れの通報を受けて、ガス会社の職員が現場に駆けつけました。 役人が到着すると、アパートが爆発しました。 重傷者は報告されていませんが、爆発時に現場にいた5人以上がショック症状に陥って治療を受けました。 アパートには誰もいませんでした。 当時、この地域から100人近くの住民が避難していました。
mt: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded after a gas leak.  After receiving a report of a gas leak from neighbors, employees from the gas company arrived at the scene.  When the officer arrived, the apartment exploded.  There were no reports of injuries, but five or more people who were at the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms.  No one was in the apartment at the time.  At the time, about 100 residents from the area were evacuated.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: 死亡したのは、ニコラス・オールデンさん（25歳）と運転手を務めるザカリー・カッドバックさん（21歳）でした。 エドガー・ベギラさんは腕と顎を負傷し、クリストファー・シュナイダーさんは顔の再建手術が必要なほどの重症を負いました。 ウカの武器は5人目の男の頭に向けられて失敗した。シュナイダーには痛みがあり、片目は失明し、頭蓋骨の一部が欠損し、顔はチタンで再建されている。 シュナイダーは母国の米空軍基地からビデオリンクで証言しました。
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and driver Zachary Cadby were killed. Edgar Begilla was injured in the arm and jaw, and Christopher Schnieder was seriously injured and required facial reconstruction. Uka's weapon missed the fifth man's head. Schnieder suffered pain, lost an eye, and had part of his skull missing, and his face was rebuilt with titanium. Schnieder testified via video link from a U.S. air base in his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: ゴルフとラグビーがいずれもオリンピック競技に復帰する予定です。 国際オリンピック委員会は本日、ベルリンで開かれた理事会で、大会に含める種目を決議した。ラグビー（厳密にはラグビーユニオン）とゴルフは、他の5つの競技よりも優先的なオリンピック種目の候補として選ばれた。 スカッシュ、空手、ローラースポーツは、2005年にオリンピックから除外された野球やソフトボールと同じようにオリンピック種目の候補に挙がりました。 投票は、10月にコペンハーゲンで開催されるIOCの総会で承認されなければなりません。
mt: Golf and rugby are both set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee decided on the sports to be included in the Games at a meeting in Berlin today. Rugby (strictly speaking, rugby union) and golf were chosen as candidates for the most important Olympic sports. Squash, karate and roller sports were also candidates for the Olympic sports, like baseball and softball, which were excluded from the Olympics in 2005. The vote must be approved at the IOC's general assembly in Copenhagen in October.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: ギネスビール創業者のアーサー・ギネスは、1759年9月24日にアイルランドのダブリンにあるセント・ジェームズ・ゲート醸造所を年間45ポンドで9,000年間賃り上げるというリース契約を結びました。 その250年後にギネスは年間売上100億ユーロ（147億米ドル）を上回る世界的なビジネスへの成長を遂げました。
mt: Arthur Guinness signed a lease to rent the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for 9,000 years at an annual rent of 45 pounds, on September 24, 1759. 250 years later, Guinness grew into a global business with annual sales exceeding 100 billion euros (147 billion U.S. dollars).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

mt: Arthur Guinness signed a lease to rent the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for 9,000 years at an annual rent of 45 pounds, on September 24, 1759. 250 years later, Guinness grew into a global business with annual sales exceeding 100 billion euros (147 billion U.S. dollars).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: 人間にとって致死性となる鳥インフルエンザの株、H5N1が、フランス東部のリヨン近郊の湿地帯で月曜日に発見された野生のカモの死骸に感染していることが確認されました。 フランスは、オーストリア、ドイツ、スロベニア、ブルガリア、ギリシャ、イタリアに次いで欧州連合で当該ウイルス感染の被害を受けた7番目の国です。 クロアチアとデンマークで鳥インフルエンザが疑われている症例は未確認のままです。
mt: The H5N1 strain of avian influenza, fatal to humans, was found to have infected dead wild ducks in the wetlands near Lyon, France, on Monday. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece, and Italy. Cases of avian influenza in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 2010年の地震後にハイチ国内でコレラが大流行したが、その発生源が国連平和維持軍の部隊の宿営地だった疑いが浮上し、軍が非難を受けています。 訴訟によれば、国連キャンプの廃棄物が適切に消毒されていなかったため、ハイチ最大級のアルティボナイト川の支流に細菌が侵入したとのことです。 1800年代以来、軍隊が到着するまでハイチはこの病気に関係する問題に遭遇したことはありませんでした。 正義と民主主義のためのハイチ研究所は、独自調査を実施し、ネパールの国連平和維持大隊が無意識のうちにこの病気をハイチに持ち込んだことを示唆しています。 疾病の専門家で国連に所属するダニエル・ランターニュ氏は、大流行は平和維持軍に起因する可能性が高い、と述べました。
mt: 2010 earthquake in Haiti led to a cholera epidemic, but the source of the outbreak was the United Nations peacekeeping camp. The United Nations was criticized for the outbreak. According to the lawsuit, the waste from the United Nations camp was not properly sanitized, and the bacteria entered the Artibonite River, the largest river in Haiti. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has conducted its own investigation and suggested that the Nepalese United Nations peacekeeping battalion inadvertently brought this disease to Haiti. Daniel Lantagne, a disease expert who works for the United Nations, said that the outbreak was likely caused by the United Nations.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: アイルランド政府は、この状況を是正するための議会立法の緊急性を強調している。 「公衆衛生と刑事司法の両方の観点から、この法案をできるだけ早く成立させることが重要であると」、政府の広報担当者は述べている。 厚生大臣は、関連する薬物の一時的な合法性を利用している個人の福祉と、改正後の現在では違憲となった薬物関連の有罪判決の両方に懸念を表明した。
mt: The Irish government has emphasized the urgency of passing legislation to correct this situation from both a public health and criminal justice perspective, according to a spokesperson. The Minister for Health has expressed concern over the welfare of individuals who are using drugs that are temporarily legal and the now unconstitutional convictions for drug-related offenses under the current legislation.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: ロサンゼルス警察の広報担当者クリストファー・ガルシア氏によると、この男性容疑者は、破壊行為ではなく不法侵入で捜査されているということです。 看板に物理的な破損はなく、「O」を小文字の「e」と読めるようにして平和とハートが飾った黒い防水シートで改修されました。
mt: Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia says the suspect is being investigated for unlawful entry, not vandalism. The sign has no physical damage and was modified with a black waterproof sheet to read "O" as "e" to decorate with hearts and peace symbols.
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: カーノ氏は有名だが物議を醸している英語の家庭教師で、Modern EducationやKing's Gloryで講師を務め、最盛期には9,000人の生徒がいたと公言しています。 彼の手記には、一部の親たちが下品と見なしそううな言葉が使われており、授業中には冒涜的な言葉を吐いていたと言われます。 Modern Educationは、彼が無許可でバスに大々的な広告を印刷したことや、英語教師の主任を務めていると嘘をついたことを非難しました。 彼は以前にも著作権侵害で告発されたことがありますが、起訴されませんでした。 元生徒は「授業中に俗語を使ったり、ノートにデート術を書いて教えたり、生徒同士のような感じだった」と話しています。
mt: Kanu is a controversial English tutor who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory, and claimed to have taught 9,000 students at his peak. His memoirs contain vulgar language that some parents found offensive, and he was said to have cursed during class. Modern Education criticized him for printing large advertisements on buses without permission, and for lying about being the head of the English department. He has been accused of copyright infringement in the past, but was not charged. "He would use vulgar language in class, or write about dating techniques in our notes, and it felt like he was our friend," said a former student.
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: フィリピンの首都マニラでフィリピン人の元警官がバスをハイジャックして香港の観光客を人質にしています。 ロランド・メンドーサはM16ライフルで観光客に発砲しました。 何人もの人質が救出されましたが、これまでに少なくとも6人の死亡が確認されています。 子供と高齢者を含めた人質6名が早期に解放され、フィリピン人の写真家たちも同じく解放されました。 写真家たちはご不浄に行きたがった高齢の女性の身代わりとなった。メンドーサ容疑者は銃殺された。
mt: A former Philippine police officer hijacked a bus in Manila, taking tourists from Hong Kong hostage. Roland Mendosa fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued, but at least six deaths have been confirmed. Six hostages, including children and the elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers who were also released. The photographers were willing to be the stand-in for an elderly woman who was dirty. Mendosa was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: ブラジルは地球上で最大のローマ・カトリックの国であり、ローマ・カトリック教会は一貫して同性婚の合法化に反対してきた。 ブラジルの全国議会では10年前から合法化を巡る議論が続いており、そのような民事婚は現在、リオグランデ・ド・スル州でのみ合法化されています。 法案の原案は、元サンパウロ市長のマルタ・スプリシー氏によって起草された。提案された法案は、修正された後、ロベルト・ジェファーソンの手に渡りました。 抗議者たちは、120万人の署名を集めて11月の全国大会に提出しようと考えています。
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage.  The debate over legalization has been going on in the national legislature for ten years, and such civil unions are currently only legalized in the state of Rio Grande do Sul.  The original bill was drafted by former São Paulo mayor Marta Suplicy.  The proposed bill was passed to Robert Jefferson's hands after being modified.  Protesters are planning to submit 1.2 million signatures to a national convention in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: 展示された5分後に風が吹き始め、1分後には時速70キロに達しました... その後、雨が降り、雨粒は肌に当たると針のように痛い大粒で、やがて空から雹が降ってきて、人々はパニックになり、悲鳴を上げながら、われ先にと走り回っていました。 「私は妹やその友人とはぐれてしまったのですが、途中で車椅子に乗った障害者が2人いて、飛び越えて車椅子を押している人たちがいました」とアルマン・ヴェルサーチさんは語っています。
mt: 5 minutes after the show began, the wind started to blow, reaching 70 km/h in 1 minute... Then it started to rain, and the raindrops were like needles when they hit the skin, and soon hail fell from the sky, and people panicked, screaming and running around. "I got separated from my sister and her friend, but I saw two disabled people in wheelchairs, and people pushing them over the obstacles," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: 暴風雨は、カーボベルデ諸島の西約645マイル(1040 km)の位置まで来ているが、上陸する前に散逸する可能性が高いと気象予報士は述べています。 フレッドは現在、時速105マイル（165km/h）の風速で北西に向かって進んでいます。 フレッドは、衛星画像が導入されて以来、大西洋のはるか南と東で記録された最大の熱帯低気圧であり、西経35度以東で記録された3番目の大型ハリケーンである。
mt: The storm is currently 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, but is expected to dissipate before making landfall, according to meteorologists. Fred is moving north-northwest at 105 mph (165 km/h). Fred is the largest tropical cyclone recorded in the far south and east of the Atlantic since satellite imagery was introduced, and the third largest hurricane recorded east of longitude 35°W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n規格に準拠していれば、2.4Ghzまたは5.0Ghzのどちらの周波数でも通信可能です。 これにより、基地局がデュアルバンド無線を搭載していれば、802.11a、802.11b、802.11gとの下位互換性を確保することができます。 802.11nの速度は、600Mbit/秒という理論上の最大スループットを持つ従来型の速度よりも大幅に高速です。
mt: 802.11n compliant devices can communicate on either the 2.4 GHz or 5.0 GHz frequency bands. This allows base stations equipped with dual-band wireless to maintain backward compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g. 802.11n's speed is significantly faster than the theoretical maximum throughput of the previous generation, which is 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 802.11n規格に準拠していれば、2.4Ghzまたは5.0Ghzのどちらの周波数でも通信可能です。 これにより、基地局がデュアルバンド無線を搭載していれば、802.11a、802.11b、802.11gとの下位互換性を確保することができます。 802.11nの速度は、600Mbit/秒という理論上の最大スループットを持つ従来型の速度よりも大幅に高速です。
mt: 802.11n compliant devices can communicate on either the 2.4 GHz or 5.0 GHz frequency bands. This allows base stations equipped with dual-band wireless to maintain backward compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g. 802.11n's speed is significantly faster than the theoretical maximum throughput of the previous generation, which is 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: そのオリンピック金メダリストは、コモンウェルスゲームで100mと200m自由形と3つのリレーで泳ぐ予定でしたが、本人が訴えた症状から健康状態が疑われています。 痛みを抑えるのに必要な薬がその大会で禁止されているため、彼は服用できませんでした。
mt: That Olympic gold medalist was scheduled to swim the 100m and 200m freestyle and three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but his health was questioned after he complained of symptoms. He could not take the medication he needed to suppress the pain because it was banned at that competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: そのオリンピック金メダリストは、コモンウェルスゲームで100mと200m自由形と3つのリレーで泳ぐ予定でしたが、本人が訴えた症状から健康状態が疑われています。 痛みを抑えるのに必要な薬がその大会で禁止されているため、彼は服用できませんでした。
mt: That Olympic gold medalist was scheduled to swim the 100m and 200m freestyle and three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but his health was questioned after he complained of symptoms. He could not take the medication he needed to suppress the pain because it was banned at that competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: 米国地質調査所の国際地震地図によると、アイスランドで前週に地震は記録されていません。 また、アイスランド気象庁は、過去48時間にヘクラ地域での地震活動はなかったと報告しています。 相変化につながる大きな地震活動は、3月10日に火山の山頂カルデラの北東側で発生していました。 山麓に火山活動とは無関係の暗雲が報告されています。 雲の影響で、本当に噴火が発生したのかどうかを判断しにくくなることがあります。
mt: The United States Geological Survey's International Seismological Summary reports no earthquakes in Iceland during the past week.  The Icelandic Meteorological Office reports no earthquakes in the Hekla region during the past 48 hours.  Significant seismic activity that could lead to a change in the volcano's activity occurred on March 10 in the northeast side of the crater at the summit.  Clouds unrelated to volcanic activity have been reported at the base of the mountain.  Clouds can make it difficult to determine whether an eruption has occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: 無人月周回衛星チャンドラヤーン1号は、月面衝突プローブ（MIP）を射出し、毎秒1.5 km（毎時3000マイル）で月面を高速で移動し、月の南極近くへの着陸に成功しました。 月面探査機は、3つの重要な科学機器を搭載しただけでなく、本体の各面にインドの国旗が描かれています。
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter successfully launched a lunar impact probe, which is moving at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) toward a landing near the south pole of the moon. The lunar probe is carrying three important scientific instruments, as well as the Indian flag on each side of its body.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: 今シーズン最初の発病例が報告されたのは7月下旬でした。 この病気は豚によって運ばれ、その後、蚊を媒介にして人間に感染します。 この大流行により、インド政府は深刻な影響を受けた地域への豚捕獲員の配置、数千張の蚊帳の配布、殺虫剤の散布などの措置をとりました。 数百万本の脳炎ワクチンも政府から約束されており、来年に向けて保健機関の準備に役立ちます。 今年、歴史的に最も被害が甚大だった地域にワクチンを届けるという計画でしたが、資金不足と他の疾病に比べて優先順位が低いという理由で遅れていました。
mt: The first case of the disease was reported in late July. The disease is brought by pigs and then spread by mosquitoes to humans. The government has taken measures such as deploying pig catchers to affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets, and spraying pesticides. Hundreds of millions of brain fever vaccines have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. The plan was to deliver vaccines to the most affected regions this year, but it was delayed due to lack of funds and lower priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: 改正案は2011年にすでに両院を通過している。 変更内容は立法議会で決まり、まず下院で第二文が削除され、月曜日には上院で同様の形式で可決されました。 同性結婚を禁止する法案の第二文の破綻は、将来的に市民婚の扉を開く可能性があります。 このプロセスを経て、HJR-3は2015年または2016年に選出された立法府で再度審査され、手続きが継続されることになります。
mt: The bill was passed by both houses in 2011. The changes were made in the legislature, first in the House where the second sentence was removed, and then in the Senate where the same form was passed on Monday. The failure of the second sentence of the bill prohibiting same-sex marriage could open the door to civil unions in the future. This process will be reviewed again by the legislature elected in 2015 or 2016, and the process will continue.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: 「パナマ文書とは」、2016年春にパナマの法律事務所モサック・フォンセカから報道機関に流出した脱税行為に関する書類の総称で、その総数はおよそ1000万件です。 文書には、富裕層の顧客が税金等の規制を逃れて数十億ドルの資産を隠す際に14の銀行が手助けしたことが示されています。 英国のガーディアン紙は、ドイツ銀行が1200社のペーパーカンパニーの約3分の1を支配していることを示唆しました。 世界中で抗議の声が上がり、何件もの刑事告発があり、アイスランドとパキスタンの両政府の指導者が辞任しました。
mt: "Panama Papers" is the collective name for documents leaked to the media in the spring of 2016 from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which detail tax evasion and the hiding of assets worth billions of dollars by wealthy clients with the help of 14 banks. The Guardian newspaper suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of 1,200 paper companies. Protests were heard around the world, and there were several criminal indictments, and the leaders of both the Icelandic and Pakistani governments resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: イランでは航空事故は珍しくありません。軍民ともに老朽化した整備不足の艦隊を抱え、事故が多発しています。 国際的な制裁により、新しい航空機を購入することができません。 今週初め、警察のヘリコプターが墜落して3人が死亡し、さらに3人が負傷しました。 先月、イランではアルメニア行きの旅客機が墜落し、乗客168人が死亡するという、ここ数年で最悪の航空事故が発生しました。 同じ月に、マシュハドの滑走路で別の旅客機が滑走路をオーバーランし、壁に激突して17人が死亡しました。
mt: Iran has a history of aviation accidents. Both the military and civilian fleets are aging and poorly maintained, and accidents are common. International sanctions prevent the purchase of new aircraft. Last week, a police helicopter crashed, killing three and injuring three more. Last month, an Iranian passenger jet crashed in Armenia, killing 168 passengers, the worst aviation accident in the country in years. The same month, another passenger jet overran a runway in Mashhad, crashing into a wall and killing 17.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: イラク研究会は、本日12時GMTに報告書を公開しました。 警告の内容は、現時点でイラクでどのような行動をとっても、宗派間抗争や暴力の拡大、あるいは混沌への滑落を阻止しうると保証できる者はいないというものでした。 報告書の冒頭は、公開討論と中東政策について米国内のコンセンサス形成を嘆願する一節で始まっています。 本報告書は、イラクに対する行政府の現在の政策のほぼすべての側面を強く批判し、即時の方向転換を促すものです。 78ある提言うち最初に挙げられているのは、敵対的な介入に対してイラクの国境を確保し、近隣諸国との外交関係を再び確立するために、年内に新たな外交主導権を発揮するべきだというものです。
mt: The Iraqi Study Group released its report today at noon GMT. The warning was that no matter what action is taken in Iraq, sectarian violence and chaos will continue to grow, or will slide into chaos. The report begins with a lament for the lack of consensus in the United States on the Middle East and calls for a public discussion. The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the current government policy on Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction. The first of 78 recommendations is to assert new diplomatic leadership in the region by securing Iraq's borders against hostile intervention and reestablishing diplomatic relations with neighboring countries by the end of the year.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
