src: ANSAによると、「警察は、本格的な後継者争いに火がつくのを恐れていた最上層部たちによる抗争が2～3回あるだろうと懸念していた」そうです。 警察によると、ロ・ピッコロはパレルモでプロヴェンツァーノの右腕として活躍していたことと、権力網を強化している間はできるだけ目立たないようにというプロヴェンツァーノの方針に従っていたため、その優れた経験が年配幹部たちから尊敬を集めたことで有利な状況にあるとのことです。 「1992年にマフィア撲滅運動家ジョヴァンニ・ファルコーネとパオロ・ボルセリーノの命を奪ったリイナ主導の国家との戦争に終止符を打ったとき、これらの幹部たちはプロヴェンツァーノによって抑え付けられていました。」
mt: According to ANSA, "Police were concerned that there would be two or three clashes between the top echelons who were afraid of a full-scale succession struggle." Police say that Lo Piccolo was active in Palermo as Provenzano's right hand and that he followed Provenzano's policy of not being too conspicuous while strengthening the power network, so that his excellent experience was respected by the older leaders, giving him an advantage. "When the war against the state, led by Leina, ended with the killing of anti-mafia activists Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992, these leaders were held back by Provenzano."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: ANSAによると、「警察は、本格的な後継者争いに火がつくのを恐れていた最上層部たちによる抗争が2～3回あるだろうと懸念していた」そうです。 警察によると、ロ・ピッコロはパレルモでプロヴェンツァーノの右腕として活躍していたことと、権力網を強化している間はできるだけ目立たないようにというプロヴェンツァーノの方針に従っていたため、その優れた経験が年配幹部たちから尊敬を集めたことで有利な状況にあるとのことです。 「1992年にマフィア撲滅運動家ジョヴァンニ・ファルコーネとパオロ・ボルセリーノの命を奪ったリイナ主導の国家との戦争に終止符を打ったとき、これらの幹部たちはプロヴェンツァーノによって抑え付けられていました。」
mt: According to ANSA, "Police were concerned that there would be two or three clashes between the top echelons who were afraid of a full-scale succession struggle." Police say that Lo Piccolo was active in Palermo as Provenzano's right hand and that he followed Provenzano's policy of not being too conspicuous while strengthening the power network, so that his excellent experience was respected by the older leaders, giving him an advantage. "When the war against the state, led by Leina, ended with the killing of anti-mafia activists Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992, these leaders were held back by Provenzano."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: オリンピックで2つの金メダルを獲得した日本人柔道家の斉藤仁さんは54歳で亡くなりました。 死因は肝内胆管癌であったと発表されました。 火曜日に大阪で亡くなりました。 斎藤氏はオリンピック金メダリスト、世界チャンピオンであると同時に、亡くなる前は全日本柔道連盟の練習委員長を務めていました。
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Kenzo Satō, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died on Tuesday in Osaka. The cause of death was liver cancer. Satō was an Olympic gold medalist and world champion, and also served as the training committee chairman of the All-Japan Judo Federation before his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: 旅の途中、岩崎さんは何度もトラブルに見舞われました。 海賊に襲われたり、チベットで狂犬に襲われたり、ネパールでの結婚から逃れたり、インドで逮捕されたりしたのです。
mt: During his travels, Iwazaki was repeatedly troubled. He was attacked by pirates, attacked by rabid dogs in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 旅の途中、岩崎さんは何度もトラブルに見舞われました。 海賊に襲われたり、チベットで狂犬に襲われたり、ネパールでの結婚から逃れたり、インドで逮捕されたりしたのです。
mt: During his travels, Iwazaki was repeatedly troubled. He was attacked by pirates, attacked by rabid dogs in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: ジャンカルロ・フィジケラがマシンをコントロールできなくなり、スタート直後にレースから脱落しました。 チームメイトのフェルナンド・アロンソはレースの大半をリードしていましたが、ピットストップ直後に右フロントホイールの収まりが悪かったためか、レースから脱落しました。 ミハエル・シューマッハは、レース中に受けた度重なる衝撃でサスペンションが故障したため、アロンソの直後にレースから脱落しました。
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and was forced to retire from the race at the start.  Fernando Alonso led the race for most of the race, but was forced to retire after a pit stop due to a loose right front wheel.  Michael Schumacher was forced to retire from the race after receiving multiple impacts that damaged his suspension, just behind Alonso.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: 過去3カ月間に、80人以上の逮捕者が正式に起訴されることなくセントラルブッキング施設から釈放されました。 今年4月には、グリン判事が同施設に対して、収容後24時間以上経過しても裁判所の委員による審問を受けなかった者の釈放を強制するための仮処分命令を発令しました。 コミッショナーは、保釈が認められた場合には保釈金を定め、逮捕した警官により申請された嫌疑を正式なものにします。その後、嫌疑内容は州のコンピューターシステムに入力され、事件が追跡されます。 聴聞会では、迅速な裁判を受ける被疑者の権利に基づき期日を示します。
mt: 80 or more people have been released from Central Booking without being formally charged in the past three months. In April, Judge Glenn ordered a temporary restraining order requiring the release of those who had not been questioned by a magistrate within 24 hours of their detention. Commissioners set bail and charge the arresting officer with making the charges formal. The charges are then entered into the state computer system and the case is tracked. Hearings are set based on the right to a speedy trial of the accused.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: ロディン氏はまた、アフガニスタンの人々が負担することになる決選投票にかかる費用と安全保障上のリスクを避けるために、当局が出馬を中止することにしたと述べました。 外交官は、アフガニスタンの憲法には、決戦投票を不要と判断するのに十分な曖昧さが見つかったと述べました。 これは、決選投票の中止は違憲であるとした当初の報告と矛盾しています。
mt: Rodin also said that the government decided to stop running for the sake of the people of Afghanistan, who will bear the cost and security risks of the runoff election. Diplomats said that the constitution of Afghanistan found enough ambiguity to judge that the runoff election is unnecessary. This contradicts the initial report that the runoff election is unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: 1947年にイギリスの支配からパキスタンが独立して以来、パキスタン大統領はFATAを統治するために「政治エージェント」を任命しており、FATAはほぼ完全な自治権を行使しています。 これらの駐在官は、パキスタン憲法第247条に基づき、行政と司法の業務を提供する責任を負っています。
mt: Since Pakistan's independence from British rule in 1947, Pakistani presidents have appointed "political agents" to govern FATA, which has almost complete autonomy. These officials are responsible for providing administrative and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: ライアン・ゴズリングとエマ・ストーンが出演したこの映画は、すべての主要部門でノミネートされました。 ゴズリングとストーンはそれぞれ主演男優賞と女優賞にノミネートされました。 最優秀作品賞、監督賞、撮影賞、衣装デザイン賞、映画編集賞、作曲賞、美術賞、音響編集賞、録音賞、脚本賞などにノミネートされました。 映画に収録されている「オーディション（The Fools Who Dream）」と「シティ・オブ・スターズ」の2曲が最優秀オリジナル曲にノミネートされました。ライオンズゲート・スタジオは、他のどのスタジオよりも多い26のノミネートを受けました。
mt: This film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress, respectively. The film was nominated for Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, Best Screenplay, and more. The film's two songs, "The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studios received the most nominations of any studio, with 26.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: また、NHKは新潟県の柏崎刈羽原発が正常に稼働していると報道していました。 北陸電力は、地震による影響はなく、志賀原発の1号機と2号機を停止したと報告しました。 当該地域の約9400軒の家庭に水道がなく、約100軒の家庭には電気がないことが報告されています。 被災地では一部の道路の被害を受け、鉄道が寸断され、石川県の能登空港も閉鎖されたままです。
mt: NHK reported that the Onagawa Nuclear Power Plant in Miyagi Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported that the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa Nuclear Power Plant's No. 1 and No. 2 reactors were shut down due to the earthquake. Water supply was cut off to about 9,400 households in the area, and electricity was cut off to about 100 households. Some roads were damaged, and railroads were disrupted, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: 漏れ聞いた情報によれば、当該文書は国境紛争に言及するもので、パレスチナの希望は1967年の中東戦争前の国境に基づくものです。 ほかにも両国にとって神聖な存在であるエルサレムの未来国家やヨルダン渓谷の問題が扱われていると報じられています。 イスラエルは、この協定が結ばれれば10年間にわたる峡谷での駐留継続を要求するとしていますが、その一方でパレスチナ自治政府が同意している駐在期間は5年間のみです。
mt: According to leaked information, the document refers to the border dispute and the Palestinian hope is based on the pre-1967 Middle East War borders. Other issues include the future of Jerusalem, which is sacred to both countries, and the Jordan Valley. Israel has demanded a 10-year presence in the valley, but the Palestinian Authority has agreed to a five-year stay.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: 香港生まれの馬英九は、ニューヨーク大学とハーバード大学法学大学院を卒業し、米国の永住権「グリーンカード」を保有していたこともあります。 選挙中に謝氏は、危機に陥ったら馬氏は逃げ出すかもしれないとほのめかしていました。 謝長廷は、馬英九について実物よりも写真写りが良いと主張していました。 こうした非難にもかかわらず、馬氏は中国大陸との緊密な関係を標榜して楽勝でした。
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma Ying-jeou graduated from New York University and Harvard Law School and held a green card, allowing him to live in the United States. During the campaign, Tsai Ing-wen hinted that Ma Ying-jeou might flee in a crisis. Tsai Ing-wen claimed that Ma Ying-jeou looked better in photographs than in real life. Despite such criticism, Ma Ying-jeou emphasized his close ties with mainland China and won easily.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: 多くの家族が立ち退きと戦うために法的支援を求めていることが明らかになった後、3月20日、東海岸地域法律相談所で住宅詐欺の被害者のための集会が開催されました。 入居者が状況を共有し始めた頃、関係する家族のほとんどが突然気づいたのは、OHAのキャロリン・ウィルソンが自分たちの保証金を盗んで町を飛び出したということでした。 ロックウッド・ガーデンズの入居者は、OHA警察がこの住宅詐欺に巻き込まれた可能性のあるオークランドの他の公営住宅も調査していることを知ったので、さらに40世帯以上が立ち退きに直面する可能性があると考えています。
mt: After it became clear that many families were seeking legal support to fight their evictions, a meeting for victims of housing fraud was held on March 20 at the East Coast Regional Legal Aid. As tenants began to share their situation, most of the families suddenly realized that it was when Carolyn Wilson of OHA stole their guaranty money and fled the town that they were involved in this housing fraud. Tenants of Lockwood Gardens believe that the OHA police are investigating other public housing in Oakland that may have been involved in this fraud, and that more than 40 households may be facing eviction.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: レース後もケセロウスキーが2,250ポイントを獲得してドライバーズチャンピオンシップのトップをキープしている。 ジョンソンは7点差の2,243点で2位となっています。 3位のハムリンは20ポイント差をつけられていますが、ボウヤーには5ポイント差をつけています。カーヌは2,220ポイント、トゥルークス・ジュニアは2,207ポイントでそれぞれ5位と6位につけています。 ドライバーズ選手権のトップ10にはスチュアート、ゴードン、ケンゼス、ハーヴィックらが入賞し、シーズンは残り4レースとなりました。
mt: Keselowski maintains the top spot in the drivers championship with 2,250 points. Johnson is second with 2,243 points, 20 points behind. Hamlin is third, 5 points behind Johnson.  Carnue is fifth with 2,220 points, and Truex Jr. is sixth with 2,207 points.  The top 10 includes Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick.  The season has four races remaining.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: これは、化学的に確認された火星物質が地球に落下してきたことを観測したのは、史上5回目と考えられています。 これまでに地球に落下したとされる約24,000個の隕石のうち火星起源であることが確認されているのは約34個にすぎません。 これらの岩石のうち15個は、昨年7月に落下した隕石群に 起因するものです。 地球上で非常に希少な岩石の一部は、オンス当たり11,000～22,500米ドルで取引されており、これは金の価格の約10倍です。
mt: This is the fifth time that a Martian material has been observed falling to Earth.  Only about 34 of the approximately 24,000 meteorites that have fallen to Earth have been confirmed to be of Martian origin.  Of these rocks, 15 are due to a meteorite shower that fell in July last year.  Some of the most rare rocks on Earth are traded for about $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about 10 times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: シューマッハは、F1選手権で7度の優勝を果たし、2006年に引退しましたが、負傷したフェリペ・マッサに代わって復帰する予定でした。 ブラジル人は2009年ハンガリーGPの事故で東部に重傷を負いました。 マッサは少なくとも2009年の残りのシーズンは欠場することになっている。
mt: Schumacher was set to return to the F1 championship in place of injured Felipe Massa, who suffered a head injury in the 2009 Hungarian GP accident. The Brazilian is expected to miss at least the remainder of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: シューマッハは、F1選手権で7度の優勝を果たし、2006年に引退しましたが、負傷したフェリペ・マッサに代わって復帰する予定でした。 ブラジル人は2009年ハンガリーGPの事故で東部に重傷を負いました。 マッサは少なくとも2009年の残りのシーズンは欠場することになっている。

ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: AOLはこれまで米国内で広く利用されてきたため、自らのペースでIM市場を動かし、開拓することができました。 今回の取り決めが成立した場合、こうした自由は終わるかもしれません。 ヤフーとマイクロソフトのサービスを合わせたユーザー数は、AOLの顧客数に匹敵するだろう。
mt: AOL has been able to lead the IM market in the US, so it has been able to develop the market at its own pace.  If this deal goes through, that freedom will end.  Yahoo and Microsoft's combined user base is comparable to AOL's customer base.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: 昨日の朝、トルコのガジアンテップの警察本部で自動車爆弾の爆発により、警官2人が死亡し、負傷者は20人を超えました。 知事室の報道によれば、負傷者のうち19人は警官でした。 警察は、攻撃に関与した過激派ダーシュ（ISIL）を疑っていると述べました。
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 were injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, early yesterday morning. The governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected the radical group Daesh (ISIL) was involved.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 元マサチューセッツ州知事のミット・ロムニー氏は、火曜日に行われたフロリダ共和党大統領選挙で46%以上の得票率で勝利しました。 前下院議長のニュート・ギングリッチ氏は32%で2位でした。 勝者総取りの州として、フロリダ州ではロムニー氏は50人の代議員を獲得したことで、共和党指名候補の筆頭候補に押し上げられました。
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Romney won 50 delegates, putting him in the lead for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: 元マサチューセッツ州知事のミット・ロムニー氏は、火曜日に行われたフロリダ共和党大統領選挙で46%以上の得票率で勝利しました。 前下院議長のニュート・ギングリッチ氏は32%で2位でした。 勝者総取りの州として、フロリダ州ではロムニー氏は50人の代議員を獲得したことで、共和党指名候補の筆頭候補に押し上げられました。
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Romney won 50 delegates, putting him in the lead for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: ニュート・ジングリッチ元下院議長、リック・ペリーテキサス州知事、ミケーレ・バックマン下院議員がそれぞれ4位、5位、6位に入りました。 結果が出た後、ギンリッチ氏はサントラム氏を称賛しましたが、ロムニー氏には厳しい言葉をかけました。というのも、アイオワ州でロムニー氏のギンリッチ氏に対する中傷キャンペーン広告が放映されたためです。 ペリー氏は「テキサスに戻って、今夜のコーカスの結果を見極めし、この選挙戦で自分が進むべき道があるかどうかを判断する」と述べましたが、後に選挙戦に残り、1月21日のサウスカロライナ州の予備選に出馬すると述べました。 8月にエイムズの模擬投票で勝利したバックマン議員は、選挙戦を終了することに決めた。
mt: 4th place went to former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, 5th place to Texas Governor Rick Perry, and 6th place to House Representative Michele Bachmann. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum but was harsh on Romney. This was because of a negative campaign ad aired in Iowa against Romney by Gingrich. Perry said, "I'm going back to Texas to watch tonight's caucus results and decide whether I should continue this campaign or not," but later decided to stay in the race and run in the South Carolina primary on January 21st. Representative Bachmann won the Ames straw poll in August and decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: 同局のウェブサイトでは、この番組を「これまでにない、とんでもなくオタクっぽい曲をかける昔ながらのラジオシアター！」と表現しています。 当初、番組はトークラジオに特化したインターネットラジオサイト「TogiNet Radio」のみで取り上げられ、これは長寿サイトです。 2015年末、TogiNetは子会社としてアストロネットラジオを設立しました。 この番組にはもともと、テキサス州東部の地元アマチュア声優陣が出演していました。
mt: The show is described as "a radio theater that plays the most otaku songs ever!" on the station's website.  Originally, the show was only aired on the internet radio site "TogiNet Radio", which is a long-running site.  In December 2015, TogiNet established a subsidiary, AstroNet Radio.  The show features local amateur voice actors from the East Texas area.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: ムンバイの攻撃者たちは、2008年11月26日にボートで到着し、手榴弾、自動小銃を携えて、混雑したチャトラパティ・シヴァージ・ターミナス駅や有名なタージ・マハル・ホテルを含む複数の標的を攻撃しました。 デビッド・ヘッドリーの偵察と情報収集は、パキスタンの過激派集団であるラシュカレ・タイバから送り込まれた10人の狙撃手による作戦の成功に役立ちました。 この攻撃は、インドとパキスタンの関係に大きな負担をかけました。
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived by boat and attacked multiple targets including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel, both crowded with people. David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering helped the successful operation by ten sharpshooters sent by the Pakistani extremist group Lashkar-e-Taiba. This attack put a lot of strain on the relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: ナダルの対カナダ戦の戦績は7-2です。 最近では、ブリスベン・オープンでラオニッチに敗れています。 試合中にナダルはファーストサーブで76ポイントを奪い、88%のネットポイントを獲得しています。 試合後にキング・オブ・クレーは、「最も重要なイベントの決勝に戻ってきたことに興奮している。これに勝つためにここに来た」と語りました。
mt: Nadal's record against Canada is 7-2. Recently, he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. During the match, Nadal won 76 points on his first serve and won 88% of his net points. After the match, King of Clay said, "I'm excited to be back in the final of the most important event. I came here to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

mt: Nadal's record against Canada is 7-2. Recently, he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. During the match, Nadal won 76 points on his first serve and won 88% of his net points. After the match, King of Clay said, "I'm excited to be back in the final of the most important event. I came here to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: 先週、ネイキッド・ニュースは、新しい3つの放送を始めることで、ニュース報道に与える国際言語の割り当てを大幅に増やすと発表しました。 すでに英語と日本語で報道されているこのグローバル組織は、テレビ、ウェブ、モバイル端末向けにスペイン語、イタリア語、韓国語の番組を開始しようとしています。
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it would be increasing its allocation of international languages in news reporting by starting three new broadcasts. This global organization, which already reports in English and Japanese, is now starting programs in Spanish, Italian, and Korean for television, web, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: 先週、ネイキッド・ニュースは、新しい3つの放送を始めることで、ニュース報道に与える国際言語の割り当てを大幅に増やすと発表しました。 すでに英語と日本語で報道されているこのグローバル組織は、テレビ、ウェブ、モバイル端末向けにスペイン語、イタリア語、韓国語の番組を開始しようとしています。

This global organization, which already reports in English and Japanese, is now starting programs in Spanish, Italian, and Korean for television, web, and mobile devices.

src: 水曜日のイベントの後、カルパネドは選手権で2つの個人レースに出場しました。 最初のレースはスラロームでしたが、彼女は最初の滑走でリタイア（Did Not Finish）となりました。このレースでは116人の選手のうち36人が同じ結果となりました。 もう1つのレースであるジャイアント・スラロームでは、総合タイムが4分41秒30で、1位のオーストリアのクラウディア・ローシュより2分11秒60遅れ、9位のハンガリーのギョンギ・ダニより1分09秒02遅れの4分41秒30で、女子シッティンググループの10位でフィニッシュしました。 女子シッティンググループでは4人のスキーヤーが滑走を終えられず、ジャイアントスラロームでは全117人中45人がランクインできなかった。
mt: After the Wednesday event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the championships. The first race was a slalom, but she retired (Did Not Finish) after the first run. This race had 116 skiers, and 36 of them had the same result. The other race was a giant slalom, where her total time was 4 minutes 41.30 seconds, 2 minutes 11.60 seconds behind the first-place Austrian Claudia Lösch, and 1 minute 09.02 seconds behind the ninth-place Hungarian Gyöngyi Dáni, finishing tenth in the women's sitting group. Four of the 117 skiers in the women's sitting group did not finish the giant slalom, and 45 of the 117 did not finish the giant slalom.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: 水曜日に全米バスケットボール協会（NBA）は、新型コロナウイルス感染症を懸念して、シーズンの中断を発表しました。 ユタ・ジャズの選手が新型コロナウイルス感染検査で陽性反応を示したことを受けて、NBAの決定が下されました。
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) announced a season suspension due to concerns over the novel coronavirus. The decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the novel coronavirus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: 水曜日に全米バスケットボール協会（NBA）は、新型コロナウイルス感染症を懸念して、シーズンの中断を発表しました。 ユタ・ジャズの選手が新型コロナウイルス感染検査で陽性反応を示したことを受けて、NBAの決定が下されました。
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) announced a season suspension due to concerns over the novel coronavirus. The decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the novel coronavirus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: 今日のプレイヤー・オブ・ザ・デイは、ワシントン・キャピトルズのアレックス・オヴェーチキン選手です。 ワシントンがアトランタ・トラッシャーズに5-3で勝利した際には2ゴール2アシストを記録しています。 この夜、オベーチキンの最初のアシストは、ルーキーのニックラス・バックストロームが決めた決勝ゴールでした。 その夜の2つ目のゴールは、彼の今季60点目のゴールとなりました。1シーズンで60点以上を記録した選手は、1995～1996年のジャロミア・ジャグとマリオ・ルミュー以来という快挙でした。
mt: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.  He recorded two goals and two assists in a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.  His first assist was on Nicklas Backstrom's game-winning goal.  His second goal was his 60th of the season, the first time a player has scored 60 goals in a season since Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux in 1995-1996.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: ノーザンロック銀行は、英国政府から緊急支援を受けていましたが、それが発覚して2008年に国有化されました。 ノーザン・ロックは、2007年のサブプライムローン危機に際して、リスクエクスポージャーが大きかったために支援を必要としていました。 リチャード・ブランソン卿のヴァージングループは、銀行国有化に先立ち、銀行への入札を拒否されました。 2010年当時に国有化されていた現在のハイストリート銀行ノーザン・ロックPLCは、「不良銀行」であるノーザン・ロック（アセット・マネジメント）から分割されました。 ヴァージングループはノーザンロックの「優良銀行」を購入しただけで、資産管理会社を購入したわけではありません。
mt: The Northern Rock Bank received emergency support from the British government, which was revealed in 2008 and nationalized. Northern Rock was in need of support due to its high risk exposure during the 2007 subprime loan crisis. Richard Branson's Virgin Group was refused the opportunity to bid for the bank before nationalization. The current Northern Rock plc, nationalized in 2010, was split from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management) and Virgin purchased the "good bank" Northern Rock. Virgin did not purchase the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: ラッド氏が京都議定書に署名したことで、米国は孤立し、先進国で議定書に批准しない唯一の国となった。 オーストラリアの旧保守政権は、インドや中国のような国は排出量目標に縛られていないのに石炭輸出への依存度が高く、経済に損害を与えるとして京都議定書の批准を拒否しました。
mt: By signing the Kyoto Protocol, Rudd made the United States an international pariah and the only developed country not to ratify the treaty. The former conservative government of Australia refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, saying that countries like India and China were not bound by emission targets while being highly dependent on coal exports, which would harm their economies.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: 補助的な有害生物駆除試験は、監視されその効果が評価されるので、この試験に参加する射撃手はレンジャーによる厳しい監視を受けました。 NPWSとオーストラリアのスポーツ射撃協会（NSW）の提携により、スポーツ射撃協会の狩猟プログラムで有資格ボランティアが募集されました。 NPWSと協力する公園保全・遺産局長代行ミック・オフリン氏によると、最初の射撃作戦に選ばれた4人の射撃手は、総合的な安全・訓練の指導を受けたそうです。
mt: The supplementary pest control test was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated, so shooters participating in the test were subject to strict monitoring by rangers. Under a partnership between NPWS and the NSW Sporting Shooters Association, volunteers with the association's hunting program were recruited. According to acting director of National Parks and Wildlife Service and Parks and Heritage Mick O'Farrell, the first four shooters selected for the shooting operation had received comprehensive safety and training guidance.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: この化石によれば、分子レベルでの証拠から、予想していたよりもずっと以前に分裂が起きていたことになります。 「それはすべてを元に戻さなければならないことを意味します」とエチオピアのリフトバレー調査所の研究者であり、本研究の共著者であるベルハネ・アスフォー氏は言いました。
mt: This fossil suggests that cell division occurred much earlier than previously thought, based on molecular evidence. "It means we have to start over," said Berhanu Asfaw, a researcher at the Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Institute and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: 木曜日の東京ゲームショウの基調講演で、任天堂の岩田聡社長は、同社の新型ゲーム機「ニンテンドーレボリューション」コントローラーのデザインを発表しました。 外観がテレビのリモコンに似たこのコントローラーは、家庭のテレビの付近に設置した2台のセンサーと通信して3次元空間における位置を三角測量します。 プレイヤーは空中で端末を動かすことで、ビデオゲームでアクションや動きをコントロールできるようになります。
mt: On Thursday, Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto announced the design of the controller for the company's new game console, the Nintendo Revolution, at the keynote address of the Tokyo Game Show. The controller, which resembles a television remote, communicates with two sensors placed near the television set to triangulate the player's position in three-dimensional space. Players will be able to control actions and movement in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: 先日、中国の新華社通信は飛行機がハイジャックされたと報じました。 その後の報告によると、飛行機は爆破予告を受け、アフガニスタンに戻り、カンダハールに着陸したとのことでした。 初期の報告では、この飛行機はウルムチへの緊急着陸を拒否された後、行く先を変更してアフガニスタンに向かったとされています。
mt: On Friday, China's Xinhua News Agency reported the plane was hijacked.  Later reports said the plane was forced to land in Afghanistan after receiving a bomb threat, and landed in Kandahar.  Early reports said the plane was denied an emergency landing in Urumqi and changed its destination to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: 先日、中国の新華社通信は飛行機がハイジャックされたと報じました。 その後の報告によると、飛行機は爆破予告を受け、アフガニスタンに戻り、カンダハールに着陸したとのことでした。 初期の報告では、この飛行機はウルムチへの緊急着陸を拒否された後、行く先を変更してアフガニスタンに向かったとされています。
mt: On Friday, China's Xinhua News Agency reported the plane was hijacked.  Later reports said the plane was forced to land in Afghanistan after receiving a bomb threat, and landed in Kandahar.  Early reports said the plane was denied an emergency landing in Urumqi and changed its destination to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: スウェーデンアカデミーのノーベル文学委員会の常任幹事であるサラ・ダニウス氏は月曜日、スウェーデンの公共放送ラジオの番組の中で、同委員会が2016年のノーベル文学賞受賞についてボブ・ディラン氏と直接連絡を取れなかったため、同氏と連絡を取ることを諦めたことを公に発表しました。 ダニアスは「今は何もしていない。彼の親しい協力者に電話をかけたり、メールを送ったりしたが、非常に友好的な返事が返ってきた。今のところは、確かにそれで十分だ。」と語った。
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced on Swedish public radio that the committee had given up trying to contact Bob Dylan directly about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. "We haven't done anything. I've called his closest associates and sent emails, but got a very friendly response. For now, that's enough," she said.
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: 米国のジョージ・W・ブッシュ大統領は当該発表を歓迎しました。 ブッシュ大統領の報道官であるゴードン・ジョンドロー氏は、北朝鮮の公約を「朝鮮半島の検証可能な非核化を達成するという目標に向けた大きな一歩」と表現しました。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.  White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the North Korean pledge was "a big step toward achieving the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: 1956年にスウェーデンに移住したスワニアは、3年後にスウェーデン郵便局で働き始め、その主任彫版工となりました。 スウェーデンをはじめとする28カ国の切手を1,000枚以上制作した。 彼の作品は、その質の高さと詳細さが評価され、切手収集家の中では数少ない「有名人」の1人です。彼の作品だけを専門とする収集家もいるほどです。 彼の1,000枚目の切手は、デビッド・クレッカー・エーレンストラールが2000年に発行した素晴らしい「スウェーデン国王たちの偉業」でギネスブックにも掲載されています。 彼は多くの国で紙幣の製作にも携わっており、最近では、カナダの新5ドル紙幣と新100ドル紙幣の表に描かれた首相の肖像画などがその一例です。
mt: Swain moved to Sweden in 1956, and three years later began working at the Swedish Post Office, where he became the head of the engraving department. He designed stamps for 28 countries, including Sweden, and has produced over 1,000 stamps. His work is highly regarded for its quality and detail, and he is one of the few "famous" people in the stamp-collecting world. There are even collectors who specialize in his work. His 1,000th stamp was the wonderful "Great Achievements of Swedish Kings" by David Kreckar Erenstall in 2000, which is also listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He has also worked on the production of currency in many countries, and recently, for example, the prime minister's portrait on the front of the new Canadian five-dollar bill and the new one-hundred-dollar bill.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: アラスカ州フェアバンクス南部で発生した数千バレルの原油流出事故を受けて、アラスカ横断パイプラインシステムが800マイルにわたって閉鎖されました。 消防設備の定期点検後に発生した停電により、安全弁が開き、フォートグリーリー第9ポンプ場付近で原油が溢れ出しました。 安全弁が開いたことで設備の圧力が解放され、原油がパッド上を流れ、55,000バレル（230万ガロン）を収容できるタンクに流れ込みました。 水曜日の午後の時点では、タンク内の熱膨張によるものと思われるタンクの通気孔からの漏れが続いていました。 10万4500バレルを貯蔵できるタンクの下にある別の二次格納容器は、まだ満杯ではありませんでした。
mt: 800 miles of the Alaska Pipeline System was closed after a spill of thousands of barrels of oil in the south of Fairbanks, Alaska. The spill occurred after a power outage during a routine inspection of the fire equipment. The safety valve opened, allowing oil to overflow near the Fort Greely Pump Station. The opening of the safety valve released the pressure of the equipment, allowing the oil to flow over the pad and into a tank that could hold 55,000 barrels (230,000 gallons). As of the afternoon of Wednesday, the leak was continuing from the vent of the tank, thought to be due to thermal expansion. A secondary containment tank, which could hold 10,450 barrels, was not yet full.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: 米工兵隊は、以前に決壊した堤防が6インチの降水量で再び決壊する可能性があると推定しています。 ハリケーン「カトリーナ」の上陸時に20フィートもの高さがある洪水が確認された第九区では、近くの堤防が水没したため、現在、腰の高さの水の中にあります。 水は幅100フィートの範囲にわたって堤防の上にこぼれ落ちています。
mt: The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers estimates that the levee that broke earlier could break again with six inches of rainfall. In the Ninth Ward, where Hurricane Katrina's landfall brought 20-foot-high flooding, the levee is now under water because a nearby levee broke, and the water is up to the waist in the area. The water is spilling over the levee in a 100-foot-wide area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: ハミルトン氏は、患者が安定した状態でハワード大学病院に入院したことを認めました。 この患者は、エボラウイルスの症例がいくつか発生しているナイジェリアに行っていた。 病院では、感染管理手順書に従い、他人への感染の可能性を防ぐために患者を隔離するなどの措置をとっています。
mt: Hamilton said the patient was admitted to Howard University Hospital in stable condition. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where a few cases of Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital is following infection control protocols, isolating the patient to prevent the possibility of infecting others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: 彗星は、タンパク質を形成し、生命を支える有機物を運び、地球への水の供給源であった可能性があります。 科学者たちは、はるか昔に彗星が地球と衝突して以来、どのように惑星が形成され、特に地球がどのように形成されたかを理解したいと考えています。
mt: Comets may have brought proteins that formed organic matter that supported life and water to Earth. Scientists want to understand how planets formed, especially how Earth formed, since the last time a comet collided with Earth.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: 当局はその脅威の信憑性に疑念を抱いていますが、メリーランド州輸送局はFBIの要請で閉鎖しました。 ダンプトラックがトンネルの入口を封鎖するのに使われ、80人の警察官が運転者たちに迂回路に向かうように誘導していた。 市内の別ルートである環状道路では、交通の大幅な遅延は報告されていません。
mt: Officials are skeptical of the threat's credibility, but the Maryland Department of Transportation closed at the request of the FBI. A dump truck blocked the tunnel's entrance, and 80 police officers directed drivers to detour routes. There was no major traffic delay on the city's beltway.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: 撮影者はロナルド・レーガンUCLAメディカルセンターに搬送され、その後死亡しました。 彼の年齢は20代だったと報じられました。声明でジャスティンビーバーは「俺はその現場にいなかったし、この悲劇的な事故に直接関係していなかったけど、被害者の家族を想いながら祈るよ」と語りました。 芸能ニュースサイトTMZによると、写真家はセプルベダ大通りの反対車線に車を停め、道路を渡って進む前に警察の検問を写真に収めようとしたため、交通規制をしていたカリフォルニア州ハイウェイパトロールの警察官が横断して戻るように2回も命じたそうです。 警察によれば、写真家をはねた車の運転手が刑事告訴される可能性は低いとのことです。
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center and later died. He was in his twenties, according to reports. Justin Bieber said in a statement, "I wasn't there and I wasn't directly involved in this tragic accident, but I'm praying for the family of the victim." TMZ reports that the photographer stopped his car on the opposite lane of Sepulveda Boulevard and was taking pictures of the police checkpoint before crossing the street when a California Highway Patrol officer told him to turn around twice. The police say the driver of the car that hit the photographer is unlikely to be charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: アリアス大統領はウイルス検査で経度の陽性反応を示した、とロドリゴ・アリアス大統領府長官は述べた。 大統領の容態は安定していますが、数日間は自宅で隔離されます。 熱と喉の痛みを除けば、気分も良く、在宅で仕事をこなせる状態です。 「月曜日には全面的に業務に復帰する予定だ」とアリアス氏は声明で語りました。
mt: President Rodrigo Duterte tested positive for the virus, according to Salvador Panelo, the president's chief legal counsel. The president's condition is stable, but he will be isolated at home for several days. He feels well, except for a fever and sore throat, and is able to work from home. "I will be back in full force on Monday," Duterte said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

"I will be back in full force on Monday," Duterte said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: 熱帯性サイクロン「ゴヌ」は、モルディブの言葉でヤシの葉でできた袋から名付けられ、吹き続ける風がピーク時には時速240 km（時速149マイル）に達しました。 本日早朝までに風は83km/h前後となり、今後も弱まり続けると予想されていました。
mt: The tropical cyclone "Gonu" was named after a bag made of palm leaves in the local language of the Maldives, and the winds continued to blow at peak speeds of 240 km/h (149 mph). As of early morning today, the winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: 熱帯性サイクロン「ゴヌ」は、モルディブの言葉でヤシの葉でできた袋から名付けられ、吹き続ける風がピーク時には時速240 km（時速149マイル）に達しました。 本日早朝までに風は83km/h前後となり、今後も弱まり続けると予想されていました。
mt: The tropical cyclone "Gonu" was named after a bag made of palm leaves in the local language of the Maldives, and the winds continued to blow at peak speeds of 240 km/h (149 mph). As of early morning today, the winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: 赤潮は、天然の単細胞海洋生物であるカレニア・ブレビスの濃度が通常よりも高くなることで発生します。 自然要因が交錯して理想的な条件を作り出し、この藻類が劇的に増殖する可能性があります。 この藻は、人間と魚類の両方の神経に有害な神経毒を産生します。 魚の主な死因の1つは水中に高濃度の毒素です。 人間は、風や波の力で空気中に取り込まれた水分を呼吸時に吸い込んだ場合にその影響を受けることがあります。
mt: Red tides are caused by high concentrations of the natural single-celled marine organism Karenia brevis. Natural factors can collide to create ideal conditions for this algae to grow explosively. This algae produces neurotoxins harmful to both humans and fish. One of the main causes of fish death is high concentrations of toxins in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling water vapor taken in through breathing when wind or wave force.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: フェリシアは、かつてサフィール・シンプソン・ハリケーン・スケールでカテゴリー4の嵐でしたが、徐々に弱まって熱帯低気圧になり、火曜日に散逸しました。 その名残からほとんどの島々ではにわか雨が発生しましたが、まだ被害や洪水は報告されていません。 降水量は、オアフ島の雨量計で6.34インチに達し、「有益」と記録されました。 降雨によっては雷雨や頻繁な雷を伴うものもありました。
mt: Felicia was once a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, but gradually weakened to a tropical depression and dissipated on Tuesday. Rain showers were reported on most islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported. Rainfall was recorded as "beneficial" at 6.34 inches on the rain gauge on Oahu. Rain showers were accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: ピケJr.は2008年のシンガポールGPで、フェルナンド・アロンソが早めにピットインした直後にクラッシュし、セーフティーカーが導入されました。 先行するマシンがセーフティカーの後ろで燃料を補給する中、アロンソは集団の中で順位を上げて勝利を手にしました。 ピケJr.は2009年のハンガリーGP後に解雇されました。
mt: 2008 Singapore GP, Fernando Alonso crashed into the back of the safety car after an early pit stop. The car ahead of him was refueling while the safety car was leading the pack. Alonso passed the safety car and won the race. He was fired after the 2009 Hungarian GP.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: 木曜日に学術雑誌「サイエンス」誌に発表された研究で、エクアドルのガラパゴス諸島で新種の鳥類が生まれていたことが報告されました。 米国のプリンストン大学とスウェーデンのウプサラ大学の研究者らは、この新種がわずか2世代で進化したことを報告しましたが、この過程は、固有種のガラパゴスフィンチと移入種のオオサボテンフィンチが交配した繁殖であるため、もっと長い時間がかかると考えられていました。
mt: On Thursday, researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported in the journal Science that a new species of bird had been born on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. The researchers reported that the new species had evolved in just two generations, but this process was thought to have taken longer, as it was a hybridization between the endemic Galapagos finch and the introduced large cactus finch.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: この芸術的な催しは、ブカレスト市役所によるキャンペーンの一環でもあり、ルーマニアの首都のイメージを塗り変えて創造的で色彩豊かな大都市にしようという企画です。 ブカレスト市では、今年6月から8月にかけて、世界最大のパブリックアートイベント「カウパレード」がヨーロッパ南東部で初めて開催されます。
mt: This artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall to transform the image of the Romanian capital into a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will host the world's largest public art event, "Coup Parade", for the first time in Southeast Europe from June to August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: この航空機はイルクーツクに向かっており、内務省所属の部隊が操縦していました。 調査のために調査機関が設立されました。 Il-76は1970年代からロシアとソビエトの両軍で主力機として活躍してきましたが、先月にはロシアではすでに重大事故が発生していました。 10月7日、離陸時にエンジンが機体から分離し、けが人は出ませんでした。事故後、ロシアはIL-76を一時的に着陸させました。
mt: This aircraft was en route to Irkutsk and was being flown by a Ministry of Internal Affairs unit. An investigation has been established to investigate the crash. The Il-76 has been the mainstay of the Russian and Soviet militaries since the 1970s, but a major accident occurred in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine separated from the aircraft during takeoff, and no one was injured. After the accident, Russia temporarily grounded the Il-76.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: シンプソンズが始まる前、サイモンはさまざまな肩書きで複数の番組で働いていました。 1980年代には「タクシー」、「チアーズ」、「トレイシー・ウルマン・ショー」などの番組で活躍しました。 1989年に彼はブルックスとグレイニングとともにシンプソンズの制作に携わり、番組の初期ライターチームの採用を担当しました。 1993年に番組を降板したにもかかわらず、彼は制作責任者の肩書きを持ち続け、毎シーズン数千万ドルの印税を受け取り続けました。
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on a variety of shows under various titles. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he was involved in the production of The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the initial writing team for the show. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he continued to hold the title of executive producer, and continued to receive millions of dollars in royalties every season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: フルークは、女性の健康がないがしろにされていることを口外しないように圧力がかけられていることについて書きました。 彼女がこの結論に至ったのは、避妊薬が医学的に必要であると考えるよう促す多くの肯定的な意見や励ましが女男性双方から寄せられたためです。
mt: Fluke wrote that women are being pressured to keep quiet about their health being ignored. She came to this conclusion because of many positive opinions and encouragements from both men and women that encouraged her to think that birth control pills are medically necessary.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: 水のように流れ、水のように透明です。 海岸線のそばに立てば、海底にある小石まで泥も見通せるのです。 「私たちの知る限り、タイタンよりもダイナミズムを発揮する惑星は1つだけで、その名は地球です」とストファン氏は付け加えました。
mt: It flows like water, and is as transparent as water. If you stand on the shoreline, you can see the pebbles on the ocean floor. "To our knowledge, there is only one planet in the solar system that is more dynamic than Earth, and its name is Earth," Mr. Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: これは、少なくとも一部の恐竜が羽を持っていたことを確認するだけでなく、色や立体配置など、一般的には化石にはない詳細な点を伝えています。 .科学者によると、この動物の羽毛は外側が栗色で内側が暖色系の色でした。 この発見はまた、鳥類の羽毛の進化について探るための手がかりとなるものでした。 恐竜の羽毛には羽軸と呼ばれる十分に発達した軸がないものの、他の羽毛の特徴である綿羽や小羽枝があることから、研究者らは羽軸はこうした他の特徴よりも後に起きた進化であった可能性が高いと推測しています。 羽毛の構造から、飛行の目的ではなく、体温調節や視覚的効果に使用されていたと推測されます。研究者らは、これが若い恐竜の尾であるにもかかわらず、標本は大人の羽毛を示しており、ヒヨコの羽毛ではないことを示唆しました。 研究者らは、この標本が若い恐竜の尻尾であるにもかかわらず、ひなの羽毛ではなく大人の羽毛が生えていることを示唆している。
mt: This discovery not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides details such as color and three-dimensional positioning that are usually not found in fossils..Scientists say the animal's feathers were reddish-brown on the outside and warm-toned on the inside. This discovery also serves as a clue for exploring the evolution of bird feathers. Although the feathers of dinosaurs lack a well-developed shaft called the rachis, they have other features of feathers such as downy feathers and small rachis. Researchers speculate that the rachis evolved later than these other features. From the structure of the feathers, it was speculated that they were not used for flight, but for thermoregulation and visual effects. Researchers suggested that this indicated that the specimen was a young dinosaur's tail, but that the specimen showed adult feathers, not chick feathers. Researchers suggest that this specimen shows adult feathers even though it is a young dinosaur's tail.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 実験的なワクチンでエボラの死亡率が減るように見えますが、今までのところ、既存の感染症の治療に適しているとはっきり実証された薬剤はありません。 抗体カクテルの1つであるZMappは、当初はこの分野で有望視されていましたが、正式な研究では期待されたほどの死亡予防効果がないことが示されました。 PALM試験では、ZMappは対照薬として使用され、科学者たちはZMappを基準として、他の3つの治療法と比較しました。
mt: Experimental vaccines appear to reduce Ebola's death rate, but so far no drug has been definitively proven to treat existing infections. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, was initially seen as promising in this field, but formal research showed it did not prevent as many deaths as expected. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, and scientists compared it to three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 月曜日にスタンフォード大学医学部の科学者たちは、細胞を種類別に分類できる新しい診断ツールを発明したと発表しました。それは標準的なインクジェットプリンタで印刷して製造できる小型チップであり、原価は1枚あたり1円ほどす。 主任研究者は、これは低所得国における患者の癌、結核、HIV、マラリアの早期発見につながる可能性があると述べます。こうした国では、乳がんなどの病気の生存率が豊かな国の半分になることもあるとされます。
mt: On Monday, scientists at the Stanford University School of Medicine announced a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells into types. It is a small chip that can be printed with a standard inkjet printer and costs about a penny per copy. The lead researcher said that this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV, and malaria in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer can be half that of wealthy countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: 月曜日にスタンフォード大学医学部の科学者たちは、細胞を種類別に分類できる新しい診断ツールを発明したと発表しました。それは標準的なインクジェットプリンタで印刷して製造できる小型チップであり、原価は1枚あたり1円ほどす。 主任研究者は、これは低所得国における患者の癌、結核、HIV、マラリアの早期発見につながる可能性があると述べます。こうした国では、乳がんなどの病気の生存率が豊かな国の半分になることもあるとされます。
mt: On Monday, scientists at the Stanford University School of Medicine announced a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells into types. It is a small chip that can be printed with a standard inkjet printer and costs about a penny per copy. The lead researcher said that this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV, and malaria in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer can be half that of wealthy countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: 科学者たちは、非常にゆっくりと月が縮小しているために発生したと思われる耳たぶ状の崖と呼ばれる、月の表面に散在する地形を発見しました。 このような傾斜面は月のいたるところに見られ、風化は最小限に抑えられているようで、傾斜面を作り出した地質学的事象がかなり最近のものであることを示しています。 この理論は、月は地質学的活動がない死んだ天体であるという主張と矛盾する説です。
mt: Scientists have discovered what they believe to be ear-shaped cliffs, or rilles, scattered across the moon's surface. These slopes are seen everywhere on the moon, and appear to have been created by a recent geological event, as they are not as weathered as other slopes. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is a dead celestial body with no geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: アデコヤ氏はその後、息子の殺害容疑でエディンバラ保安官裁判所に出頭しています。 彼女は起訴と公判まで身柄を勾留されていますが、本人の写真が広く公開されているため、目撃者の証拠が損なわれる可能性があります。 これは英国内の他の地域で一般的に行われていることですが、スコットランドの司法制度は異なっており、裁判所は写真の公開を潜在的に悪影響のあるものと見なしています。 ダンディー大学のパメラ・ファーガソン教授は、「容疑者の写真などを公開する報道記者は危い橋を渡っている」と指摘しています。 起訴を全面的に担当する王座裁判所刑事部は、記者団に対して、少なくとも起訴されるまではこれ以上のコメントはしないとの意向を示しています。
mt: Adekoya is due to appear at Edinburgh Sheriff Court on suspicion of murdering her son. She is being held in custody until charged and tried, but her picture has been widely published, which could compromise witness evidence. This is common in other parts of the UK, but the Scottish legal system is different, and the court sees the publication of a suspect's picture as potentially prejudicial. Pamela Ferguson, professor of law at Dundee University, said: "Journalists who publish pictures of suspects are walking a dangerous line." The Crown Office, which will be fully responsible for the prosecution, has indicated to the press that it will not be making any further comment until the suspect is charged.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: 砕氷に加えて、極端な気象条件が救助活動を妨げています。 ピットマン氏は、来週になるまで状況は改善しないだろうと示唆した。 ピットマン氏によると、流氷の量と厚さは、アザラシ漁師にとって過去15年間で最悪の状態だそうです。
mt: In addition to the icebreaker, extreme weather conditions are hampering the rescue effort. Mr. Pittman suggested the situation will not improve until next week. Mr. Pittman said the amount and thickness of the ice is the worst in 15 years for seal hunters.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: ロバーツ氏は、中絶の倫理を考えるうえで重要な「命の始まりはいつの時点か」という疑問について、「可能性の高いケースの具体的な内容についてコメントするのは倫理的ではない」と断固として拒否しました。 しかし、彼はロー対ウェイド裁判は「確定した土地法」であるという先の発言を繰り返し、一貫した最高裁判決の重要性を強調しました。 彼はロー判決が依拠する暗黙のプライバシー権を信じていることも裏付けました。
mt: Roberts declined to comment on the specific content of the "when does life begin" question, saying it was "not appropriate to comment on the specifics of a hypothetical case." However, he reiterated his earlier statement that the Roe decision was "settled law," emphasizing the importance of a consistent Supreme Court ruling. He also reaffirmed his belief in the implicit privacy right on which the Roe decision was based.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: 午前8時46分ちょうどに街中が静寂に包まれました。最初のジェット機が目標に衝突した瞬間でした。 二筋の光が一晩中空に向かうように配備されています。 敷地内には新たに5つの超高層ビルが建設中で、その中央には交通センターと記念公園があります。
mt: 8:46 am on the morning of September 11, 2001, the streets of New York City fell silent. At that moment, the first jetliner struck its target. Two beams of light were installed to point skyward for the night. Five new skyscrapers are under construction on the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: 洞窟の入口は7つあって「セブン・シスターズ」と呼ばれ、いずれも直径100～250 m(328～820フィート)ほどです。 赤外線画像を見ると、昼夜の温度差から洞窟である可能性が高いことがわかります。 昼間は周囲の表面よりも涼しく、夜間は暖かくなります。 「そうした熱挙動は、一定の温度をかなり保てる地球上の大洞窟ほど安定していないことが多いのですが、地中に深い穴ができる点は一致しています」と、米国地質調査所(USGS)宇宙地質学チームとアリゾナ州フラッグスタッフにあるノーザンアリゾナ大学のグレン・クッシング氏は述べています。
mt: 7 Sisters is the name of the cave's entrance, which is 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the cave is likely to be a cave because the temperature difference between day and night. During the day, it is cooler than the surrounding surface, and at night it becomes warmer. "Such thermal behavior is not stable in the earth's large caves that can maintain a certain temperature, but the point of digging a hole in the ground is consistent," said Glenn Cushing of the USGS Space Geology Team and Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: 男は爆発物を積んだ三輪自動車で群衆に突っ込んだと報じられています。 爆弾を爆発させた疑いのある男は、爆風で負傷した後、拘留された。 当局は彼がウイグル族の一員であることを突きとめたものの、まだ名前までは把握していません。
mt: A man drove a three-wheeled vehicle filled with explosives into a crowd, according to reports. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was injured in the blast and detained. Authorities have identified him as a member of the Uighur ethnic group, but have not yet released his name.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: 南アフリカのルステンブルグにあるロイヤル・バフォケン・スタジアムで開催されたラグビーユニオンの3か国試合で、南アフリカはニュージーランドのオールブラックスに勝利するという快挙を成し遂げました。 最終スコア21対20の1点差勝利で、オールブラックスの15連勝に終止符が打たれました。 スブリングボックにとっては、5連敗が止まりました。 その試合はすでに2週間前にトロフィーを獲得したオールブラックスの最後の試合でした。 シリーズ最終戦は来週、ヨハネスブルグのエリス・パークでスプリングボクスがオーストラリアと対戦します。
mt: In a Rugby Union three-nation match held at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, South Africa defeated the New Zealand All Blacks, achieving a feat of 21 to 20. The All Blacks' 15-game winning streak ended. The match was already two weeks ago when the All Blacks had already won the trophy. The final match will be next week in Johannesburg's Ellis Park, where the Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: 国際宇宙ステーションは、その任務を果たす前にジャイロスコープを失ったにもかかわらず、宇宙遊泳が終わるまで姿勢を維持していました。 チャオとシャリポフは姿勢調整スラスターから安全な距離にいると報告した。 ロシアの地上管制管が一連のジェット機を稼働し、宇宙ステーションは正常な姿勢を取り戻しました。
mt: The International Space Station was able to maintain its orientation until the spacewalk ended despite losing its gyroscope before its mission was complete. Chao and Sharipov reported that they were at a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. Russian ground control fired a series of jets to restore the space station to a normal orientation.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: この事件は、告発を扇動した大手インターネットサービスプロバイダーAOLの本拠地であるバージニア州で起訴されました。 2003年に制定されたこの法律を利用して、ユーザーのメールボックスに迷惑メール (スパムとも呼ばれる) を送り込む行為を有罪とする判決が下されたのは、今回が初めてでした。
mt: The case was filed in Virginia, the home state of the major Internet service provider AOL, which was accused of inciting the prosecution.  The first conviction under this law, which was enacted in 2003, was for sending unsolicited email (also known as spam) to a user's mailbox.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28歳のビダル選手は、3シーズン前にセビージャから移籍してバルサに所属していました。 カタルーニャの州都に移って以来、ビダルはクラブで49試合に出場しました。
mt: 28-year-old Vidal played for Barcelona after moving from Sevilla three seasons ago. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played in 49 matches for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: その日の未明、ジャルケはイタリアのカバーチアーノでシーズン前のトレーニング中で練習に励んでいました。彼は日曜日に予定されていたボロニア戦の試合を前にチームのホテルに滞在していました。 日曜日に予定されていたボローニャ戦の試合を前に彼はチームのホテルに宿泊していました。
mt: In the early hours of the day, Jale was training in Cavaria, Italy, before the season's first training. He was staying at the team's hotel before the scheduled match against Bologna on Sunday. He was staying at the team's hotel before the scheduled match against Bologna on Sunday.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: その日の未明、ジャルケはイタリアのカバーチアーノでシーズン前のトレーニング中で練習に励んでいました。彼は日曜日に予定されていたボロニア戦の試合を前にチームのホテルに滞在していました。 日曜日に予定されていたボローニャ戦の試合を前に彼はチームのホテルに宿泊していました。
